612020.name: Preservation
612020.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.
612020.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Physical DMG to all enemies based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by Shields on all allies.
612020.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Preservation, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies based on the total Shield between all allies.

612021.name: Zero-Dimensional Reinforcement
612021.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by **15%**.
612021.shortDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation are guaranteed to CRIT. The more characters there are with Shields, the higher the CRIT DMG.
612021.battleDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Preservation become CRIT Hits. For every Shielded character on the team, the CRIT DMG increases by **15%**.

612022.name: Eutectic Reaction
612022.desc: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **1%** of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and **Amber** is applied to all allies at the same time.
612022.shortDesc: Applies a Shield and **Amber** to all characters after using a Path Resonance.
612022.battleDesc: When Path Resonance is used, all allies gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **1%** of their respective Max HP, for 2 turns, and **Amber** is applied to all allies at the same time.

612023.name: Isomorphous Reaction
612023.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **3%** Energy.
612023.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When a character gains Shield, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612023.battleDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an ally gains a Shield, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **3%** Energy.

612024.name: Spiked Armor
612024.desc: There is a **150%** base chance for Path Resonance: Preservation to inflict Bleed on the attacked target for **2** turn(s). Bleeding enemies will take Physical DoT equal to **12%** of their Max HP at the start of each turn. This DMG cannot exceed **250%** of the total amount of Shield Effect currently active on all allies.
612024.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, there is a high chance of applying Bleed to the enemy. DMG dealt is based on the total Shield on all allies.

612025.name: Cold Snap
612025.desc: When attacking Frozen enemy targets with Path Resonance: Preservation, the DMG dealt increases by **80%** and the Freeze status on the enemy targets is removed. **Dissociation** will not be removed by this effect.
612025.shortDesc: Increases DMG dealt by Path Resonance: Preservation to Frozen enemies and dispels their Freeze status.

612026.name: Reverse Quenching
612026.desc: When using Path Resonance, extends Shield duration by **2** turn(s) on characters whose current HP is below **50%** of their Max HP. For every character on which this takes effect, this current use of the Path Resonance deals **20%** more DMG.
612026.shortDesc: Casting the Path Resonance extends Shield duration for allies whose HP percentage is below **50%** and enables the next Path Resonance to deal more DMG.

612027.name: Displaced Ascent
612027.desc: Using the Ultimate increases the next Path Resonance's Physical RES PEN by **8%**, stacking up to **8** time(s).
612027.shortDesc: Using an Ultimate increases the next Path Resonance's Physical PEN.

612030.name: Resonance Transfer
612030.desc: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield Effect plus **20%** of the total Shield Effect of the character's teammates to the hit enemies.
612030.shortDesc: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals **Quake** DMG based on the current total Shield Effect on the ally team.
612030.battleDesc: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield Effect plus **20%** of the total Shield Effect of the character's teammates to the hit enemies.

612031.name: Metastatic Field
612031.desc: After a character is attacked, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **420%** of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
612031.shortDesc: After a character is hit by an attack, deals **Quake** DMG to the enemy target based on the total Shield Effect on the character before they were hit.
612031.battleDesc: After a character is attacked, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **420%** of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.

612032.name: Macrosegregation
612032.desc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **10%** of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen by **130%**. For every **2** turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.
612032.shortDesc: When entering battle, characters gain a stackable special Shield. This Shield is reset every **2** turn(s).
612032.battleDesc: At the start of the battle, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **10%** of their Max HP. Whenever another Shield is gained, this special Shield will also strengthen by **130%**. For every **2** turn(s), this will be removed, and then this special Shield can be regained.

612040.name: Shear Structure
612040.desc: Characters deal **15%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target, and other targets also take **Quake** DMG equal to **30%** of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
612040.shortDesc: **Quake** DMG increases and is Blasted to all enemies.
612040.battleDesc: Characters deal **15%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target, and other targets also take **Quake** DMG equal to **30%** of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.

612041.name: Burst Lattice
612041.desc: When a character deals **Quake** DMG to an enemy target, there is a **100%** base chance to cause the target to Bleed.
612041.shortDesc: **Quake** has a high chance of applying Bleed to enemies.
612041.battleDesc: When a character deals **Quake** DMG to an enemy target, there is a **100%** base chance to cause the target to Bleed.

612042.name: Solid Solution
612042.desc: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **120%** of the character's current DEF.
612042.shortDesc: The DMG **Quake** deals increases with the character's DEF.
612042.battleDesc: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **120%** of the character's current DEF.

612043.name: Safe Load
612043.desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **60%** of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of **160%** of their Base ATK.
612043.shortDesc: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.
612043.battleDesc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **60%** of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of **160%** of their Base ATK.

612044.name: Sanctuary
612044.desc: At the end of the turn, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **15%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612044.shortDesc: Characters receive a Shield at the end of the turn.
612044.battleDesc: At the end of the turn, characters gain a special Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **15%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).

612045.name: Quadrangular Pyramid
612045.desc: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by **35%**.
612045.shortDesc: When a character receives a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield.
612045.battleDesc: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by **35%**.

612046.name: Hypoeutectoid
612046.desc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **36%** of the provided Shield for **2** turn(s).
612046.shortDesc: Characters also receive a Shield when creating Shield(s) for allied targets.
612046.battleDesc: When a character provides Shields to allies, this character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **36%** of the provided Shield for **2** turn(s).

612050.name: Assemble
612050.desc: Characters gain a **8%** DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of **9** time(s).
612050.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Preservation the team has, the higher the characters' DEF becomes.
612050.battleDesc: Characters gain a **8%** DEF increase for each Preservation Blessing, stacking up to a max of **9** time(s).

612051.name: Sentinel
612051.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **24%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612051.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.
612051.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **24%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612052.name: Patch
612052.desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612052.shortDesc: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.
612052.battleDesc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612053.name: Compensation
612053.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).
612053.shortDesc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.
612053.battleDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).

612055.name: Rotation
612055.desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **30%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
612055.shortDesc: When a character receives a Shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.
612055.battleDesc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **30%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.

612056.name: Burst
612056.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **45%**.
612056.shortDesc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.
612056.battleDesc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **45%**.

612057.name: Concentration
612057.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **24%**.
612057.shortDesc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.
612057.battleDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **24%**.

612120.name: Remembrance
612120.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a **120%** base chance to Freeze all enemies for **1** turn(s).
612120.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, deals Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing them.
612120.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a **120%** base chance to Freeze all enemies for **1** turn(s).

612121.name: Total Recall
612121.desc: When Path Resonance is used, there is a **150%** base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by **100%** for **1** turn(s).
612121.shortDesc: When using Path Resonance, there is a high chance of reducing all enemies' Freeze RES.
612121.battleDesc: When Path Resonance is used, there is a **150%** base chance to decrease enemies' chance to resist Frozen by **100%** for **1** turn(s).

612122.name: Rich Experience
612122.desc: When using Path Resonance, there is a **150%** base chance to apply **Eonian River** to all enemies for 1 turn.
612122.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, there is a high chance to apply **Eonian River** to all enemies.
612122.battleDesc: When using Path Resonance, there is a **150%** base chance to apply **Eonian River** to all enemies for 1 turn.

612123.name: First Love Once More
612123.desc: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **5%** Energy.
612123.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612123.battleDesc: Upon battle entrance, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy becomes Frozen, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **5%** Energy.

612124.name: Faces Places
612124.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a **150%** base chance of lowering the target's All-Type RES by **15%** for **2** turn(s). For every 1% HP that each ally has lost, the target's All-Type RES is additionally lowered by **0%**.
612124.shortDesc: When the Freeze effect of a Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, reduces the enemy target(s)' All-Type RES based on the total lost HP percentage of all team members.

612125.name: Landscape in the Mist
612125.desc: When the Freeze effect caused by Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted by enemy targets, there is a **150%** base chance of decreasing the target's SPD by **15%** for **2** turn(s).
612125.shortDesc: When the Freeze effect of a Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, there is a high chance of reducing the enemy's SPD.

612126.name: Roar and Rustle
612126.desc: When the Freeze effect from the Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted, characters gain a Shield equal in strength to **40%** of their Max HP for **2** turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once by each use of the Path Resonance.
612126.shortDesc: Gains a Shield when the Freeze effect from the Path Resonance is dispelled or resisted.

612127.name: Seemingly Mirrored
612127.desc: Basic ATKs against enemies Frozen by the Path Resonance have a **100%** base chance to inflict **Dissociation** on them for **1** turn(s).
612127.shortDesc: Basic ATKs against enemies Frozen by the Path Resonance have a high chance to inflict **Dissociation** on them.

612130.name: Fuli
612130.desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** to the enemy for **1** turn(s). DMG dealt when **Dissociation** is removed +**20%**.
612130.shortDesc: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply **Dissociation** on them and deal extra DMG.
612130.battleDesc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** to the enemy for **1** turn(s). DMG dealt when **Dissociation** is removed +**20%**.

612131.name: Innocence
612131.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.
612131.shortDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ignore the enemy's Freeze RES and apply **Dissociation** on them.
612131.battleDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.

612132.name: Reticence
612132.desc: After an enemy is attacked **5** time(s), they have a **150%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
612132.shortDesc: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every **5** attack(s) it receives.
612132.battleDesc: After an enemy is attacked **5** time(s), they have a **150%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).

612140.name: Melancholia
612140.desc: Attacking an enemy with **Dissociation** will remove **Dissociation**, and deal DMG equal to **200%** of the **Dissociation** removal DMG.
612140.shortDesc: When a character attacks an enemy with **Dissociation**, remove **Dissociation** from the enemy and increase the DMG received when this status is removed.
612140.battleDesc: Attacking an enemy with **Dissociation** will remove **Dissociation**, and deal DMG equal to **200%** of the **Dissociation** removal DMG.

612141.name: Dizziness
612141.desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **54%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.
612141.battleDesc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **54%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.

612142.name: Insensitivity
612142.desc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612142.shortDesc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a high chance for them to become Frozen.
612142.battleDesc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).

612143.name: Sentimentality
612143.desc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, all other enemies also receive DMG equal to **24%** of the DMG taken by the target enemy.
612143.shortDesc: Ice DMG dealt to an enemy can be Blasted to all enemies.
612143.battleDesc: After an enemy receives Ice DMG, all other enemies also receive DMG equal to **24%** of the DMG taken by the target enemy.

612144.name: Indelibility
612144.desc: Enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **20%**. When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there is a **3%** base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for **1** turn(s).
612144.shortDesc: Reduce the enemy's Freeze RES. When characters deal DMG to enemies, there is a small chance to Freeze the enemy.
612144.battleDesc: Enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **20%**. When a character deals DMG to an enemy, there is a **3%** base chance to Freeze the hit enemy for **1** turn(s).

612145.name: Shudder
612145.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for **2** turn(s).
612145.shortDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy without Ice Weakness gains Ice Weakness.
612145.battleDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for **2** turn(s).

612146.name: Maverick
612146.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by **30%**, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612146.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemy units, as well as lowering their SPD.
612146.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by **30%**, lasting for **1** turn(s).

612150.name: Unspeakable Shame
612150.desc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **8%**, stacking up to **9** time(s).
612150.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Remembrance the team has, the lower the enemy targets' Freeze RES become.
612150.battleDesc: For every Blessing of Remembrance the team has, enemies' chance to resist Frozen decreases by **8%**, stacking up to **9** time(s).

612151.name: The Torment of Alienation
612151.desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **24%**.
612151.battleDesc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **24%**.

612152.name: Lost Memory
612152.desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **100%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
612152.shortDesc: Enemies have a high chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low HP from allies' attacks.
612152.battleDesc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **100%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).

612153.name: Stone Cold Hatred
612153.desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **54%**.
612153.shortDesc: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.
612153.battleDesc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **54%**.

612154.name: Pain & Suffering
612154.desc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next **2** attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have **100%** increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.
612154.shortDesc: After an enemy is Frozen, the next **2** attack(s) they receive are guaranteed to CRIT.
612154.battleDesc: Right after an enemy is Frozen, the next **2** attack(s) launched against the said enemy will have **100%** increased CRIT Rate. This effect is dispelled when the Frozen state is removed.

612155.name: Primordial Hardship
612155.desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **24%**.
612155.shortDesc: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.
612155.battleDesc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **24%**.

612156.name: Thrill of Escalation
612156.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **12** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
612156.shortDesc: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612156.battleDesc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **12** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.

612157.name: Responsive Excitement
612157.desc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **24%** of their Max HP for **3** turn(s).
612157.shortDesc: Characters gain a Shield when they apply Freeze on enemies.
612157.battleDesc: When a character applies Freeze to an enemy, the character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **24%** of their Max HP for **3** turn(s).

612220.name: Nihility
612220.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a **80%** base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for **2** turn(s).
612220.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, there is a high chance of applying Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear on all enemies.
612220.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Nihility, with a **80%** base chance to apply Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear on all enemies for **2** turn(s).

612221.name: The Doubtful Fourfold Root
612221.desc: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by **100%** and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.
612221.shortDesc: When using the Path Resonance, increases the base chance of inflicting status effects, extends the duration of these status effects, and adds to their stacks.
612221.battleDesc: When using Path Resonance, increases the base chance of applying statuses by **100%** and the duration of statuses by 1 turn, and adds 1 stack to all stackable statuses.

612222.name: Suffering and Sunshine
612222.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a **100%** base chance to inflict 2 stacks of **Confusion** and 2 stacks of **Devoid** on all enemies for **2** turn(s).
612222.shortDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a high chance to apply **Confusion** and **Devoid**.
612222.battleDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Nihility have a **100%** base chance to inflict 2 stacks of **Confusion** and 2 stacks of **Devoid** on all enemies for **2** turn(s).

612223.name: Outsider
612223.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **2%** Energy.
612223.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612223.battleDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When an enemy receives DoT, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **2%** Energy.

612224.name: Off the Beaten Track
612224.desc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions by **4%**.
612224.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, for every type of debuff (out of Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear) the enemy target is currently inflicted with, Advance Forward all allies' actions.

612225.name: White Nights
612225.desc: A character's Basic ATK can cause all DoTs currently applied on the target via Path Resonance: Nihility to immediately deal DMG equivalent to **40%** of these statuses' original DMG.
612225.shortDesc: Basic ATK can additionally trigger the DoT of Path Resonance: Nihility.

612226.name: Reign of Keys
612226.desc: Path Resonance deals **30%** more DMG to Frozen enemies. When enemy targets become Frozen, DoTs applied by the Path Resonance extend their duration by **1** turn(s).
612226.shortDesc: The DoT effects from the Path Resonance deal more DMG to Frozen enemies and have their duration extended.

612227.name: Terror and Tremble
612227.desc: For each unique Type of non-DoT DMG the enemy target has taken, Path Resonance deals **6%** more DMG to it, lasting until the end of the turn.
612227.shortDesc: Path Resonance deals more DMG for each unique type of non-DoT DMG the target has taken.

612230.name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
612230.desc: Every time an enemy receives DoT, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. **Suspicion** stacks will not be reduced.
612230.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, applies **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on the enemy. **Suspicion** stacks cannot be reduced.
612230.battleDesc: Every time an enemy receives DoT, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. **Suspicion** stacks will not be reduced.

612231.name: The Man in the Cover
612231.desc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. Every time the DoT refreshes, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
612231.shortDesc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT state, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them. Every time the DoT countdown timer refreshes, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them.
612231.battleDesc: Every time an enemy is afflicted with a DoT, apply **3** stack(s) of **Suspicion**. Every time the DoT refreshes, apply **1** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.

612232.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
612232.desc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT **1** times, dealing DMG equal to **135%** of the original DoT.
612232.shortDesc: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT sources on it are triggered **1** extra time(s).
612232.battleDesc: At the beginning of an enemy's turn, trigger extra DoT **1** times, dealing DMG equal to **135%** of the original DoT.

612240.name: Beginning and End
612240.desc: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **2** random enemy target(s).
612240.shortDesc: When an enemy afflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's **Suspicion** stacks to **2** random enemy target(s).
612240.battleDesc: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **2** random enemy target(s).

612241.name: Caf√© Self-Deceit
612241.desc: When an enemy is inflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks it gains are doubled.
612241.shortDesc: When an enemy is afflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks they gains is doubled.
612241.battleDesc: When an enemy is inflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks it gains are doubled.

612242.name: Call of the Wilderness
612242.desc: For every stack of **Suspicion** the enemies have, reduces their ATK by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**, and reduces their Effect RES by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**.
612242.shortDesc: Decreases the target enemy's ATK and Effect RES based on the total stacks of **Suspicion** on the enemy team.
612242.battleDesc: For every stack of **Suspicion** the enemies have, reduces their ATK by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**, and reduces their Effect RES by **0%**, up to a max of **30%**.

612243.name: Night Beyond Pyre
612243.desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by **45%**.
612243.battleDesc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by **45%**.

612244.name: Hell is Other People
612244.desc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to all enemies.
612244.shortDesc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, all enemies will also have their Weaknesses Broken.
612244.battleDesc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the same type of Weakness Break effect is applied to all enemies.

612245.name: Twilight of Existence
612245.desc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for **2** turn(s), and dispels 1 debuff currently on the attacker.
612245.shortDesc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there's a chance of inflicting a random DoT and at the same time 1 debuff will be removed from the attacker.
612245.battleDesc: When hitting a Weakness Broken enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, or Wind Shear on the enemy for **2** turn(s), and dispels 1 debuff currently on the attacker.

612246.name: All Things are Possible
612246.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **150%** of the DoT.
612246.shortDesc: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.
612246.battleDesc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **150%** of the DoT.

612250.name: Ignosticism
612250.desc: Gains a **8%** DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).
612250.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Nihility the team has, the higher the characters' DoT becomes.
612250.battleDesc: Gains a **8%** DoT increase for each Nihility Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).

612253.name: Tragic Lecture
612253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **15%**.
612253.shortDesc: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.
612253.battleDesc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **15%**.

612254.name: Sensory Labyrinth
612254.desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **2** turn(s).
612254.shortDesc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **2** turn(s).
612254.battleDesc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear, Bleed, Shock, and Burn on enemies by **2** turn(s).

612255.name: Emotional Decluttering
612255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **4%**. This effect can stack up to **5** time(s).
612255.shortDesc: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.
612255.battleDesc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **4%**. This effect can stack up to **5** time(s).

612256.name: Offerings of Deception
612256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **2%** of their respective Max HP.
612256.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.
612256.battleDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **2%** of their respective Max HP.

612257.name: Before Sunrise
612257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, **3** Energy is regenerated for a random ally.
612257.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.
612257.battleDesc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, **3** Energy is regenerated for a random ally.

612320.name: Abundance
612320.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by **50%** of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by **15%** for **2** turn(s).
612320.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, restores all allies' HP and increases their respective Max HP.
612320.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Abundance, restore HP for all allies by **50%** of their respective Max HP, and increases their respective Max HP by **15%** for **2** turn(s).

612321.name: Terminal Nirvana
612321.desc: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to **1** time(s) per battle.
612321.shortDesc: When characters receive lethal DMG, they will not be knocked down and will automatically activate Path Resonance (consuming all Energy) instead. This effect can be triggered a limited amount of times per battle.
612321.battleDesc: When any ally receives lethal DMG, the Resonance of Path of Abundance prevents them from being knocked down and automatically consumes all Energy to release Path Resonance. This effect can trigger up to **1** time(s) per battle.

612322.name: Anicca
612322.desc: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies **1** stack(s) of **Subduing Evils** for **1** turn(s).
612322.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, remove debuffs from all characters and apply **Subduing Evils**.
612322.battleDesc: After releasing a Path Resonance, removes all characters' debuffs and applies **1** stack(s) of **Subduing Evils** for **1** turn(s).

612323.name: Anatta
612323.desc: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear on the action order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by **30%**. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance to heal allies.
612323.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance for the first time in a battle, Path Resonance: Abundance will appear on the action order.
612323.battleDesc: After Path Resonance Energy is consumed for the first time in battle for the use of Path Resonance, the Path Resonance for Abundance will appear on the action order. The Outgoing Healing provided by this Resonance decreases by **30%**. When this Resonance takes action, it will automatically release Path Resonance to heal allies.

612324.name: Mountain High
612324.desc: After a character has their HP restored via Path Resonance and if the healing amount exceeds the maximum HP, recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger 1 time per Path Resonance use. After triggering this effect, all DMG dealt by all allies is increased by **30%** for **2** turns. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s).
612324.shortDesc: When a Path Resonance overheals, recovers 1 Skill Point and increases all allies' DMG.

612325.name: Nullifying Ardor
612325.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by **15%** and Break Effect increases by **50%**. This effect lasts for **2** turn(s) and stacks up to **2** time(s).
612325.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, increases all allies' Weakness Break Efficiency and Break Effect.

612326.name: Fleeting Samadhi
612326.desc: For every 1% of healing from Path Resonance that exceeds a character's Max HP, the character deals **1%** increased Ultimate DMG. This effect is stackable, up to a maximum of **100%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612326.shortDesc: Exceeding healing from Path Resonance increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters.

612327.name: Destined Death
612327.desc: Healing from Path Resonance that exceeds a character's Max HP is stored and will be released as automatic healing when the character's HP falls below **35%** of their Max HP. Up to **50%** of the character's Max HP (when the Path Resonance is used) can be stored.
612327.shortDesc: Exceeded healing from the Path Resonance is stored and will be released when the character's HP percentage falls below **35%**.

612330.name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
612330.desc: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received, and increases the DMG of **Dewdrop** by **40%**.
612330.shortDesc: When a character's HP is restored, **Dewdrop** is Charged according to the amount of healing received, and DMG done by **Dewdrop** is increased.
612330.battleDesc: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received, and increases the DMG of **Dewdrop** by **40%**.

612331.name: Mudra of Blessing
612331.desc: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **70%** of their Max HP.
612331.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, **Dewdrop** is Charged based on the character's Max HP.
612331.battleDesc: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **70%** of their Max HP.

612332.name: All Abundance in One Mind
612332.desc: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also restore HP equal to **30%** of the amount healed. Increases the ATK of all allies by **15%** of the amount healed, stacking up to no more than **80%** of each ally's respective Base ATK and lasts until the end of the next turn.
612332.shortDesc: Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies and increase ATK based on HP restored.
612332.battleDesc: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also restore HP equal to **30%** of the amount healed. Increases the ATK of all allies by **15%** of the amount healed, stacking up to no more than **80%** of each ally's respective Base ATK and lasts until the end of the next turn.

612340.name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
612340.desc: Restores HP equal to **20%** of the Charge value when **Dewdrop** ruptures, up to **24%** of the character's Max HP and no less than **12%** of their Max HP.
612340.shortDesc: Restores the character's HP to above a minimum value when **Dewdrop** breaks.
612340.battleDesc: Restores HP equal to **20%** of the Charge value when **Dewdrop** ruptures, up to **24%** of the character's Max HP and no less than **12%** of their Max HP.

612341.name: The Blessed Many
612341.desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for **Dewdrop** by **120%**.
612341.shortDesc: When a character's HP is full, **Dewdrop**'s Charging Efficiency increases.
612341.battleDesc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for **Dewdrop** by **120%**.

612342.name: Salvation From Damnation
612342.desc: When a **Dewdrop** breaks, there is a **100%** fixed chance to remove 1 debuff on the character.
612342.battleDesc: When a **Dewdrop** breaks, there is a **100%** fixed chance to remove 1 debuff on the character.

612343.name: Candlelight Radiance
612343.desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by **50%** for **1** turn(s).
612343.shortDesc: When a character restores an ally's HP, all allies' ATK increases.
612343.battleDesc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by **50%** for **1** turn(s).

612344.name: Bitter Is the Bane
612344.desc: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to **42%** of the character's Max HP.
612344.shortDesc: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their Max HP.
612344.battleDesc: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to **42%** of the character's Max HP.

612345.name: Corporeal Pellucidity
612345.desc: When a character's HP is full, reduces their DMG taken by **36%**, and increases their Effect RES by **27%**.
612345.shortDesc: When a character's HP is full, their DMG received is reduced and Effect RES is increased.
612345.battleDesc: When a character's HP is full, reduces their DMG taken by **36%**, and increases their Effect RES by **27%**.

612346.name: Prajna Voyage
612346.desc: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to **45%** of the amount of HP healed.
612346.shortDesc: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.
612346.battleDesc: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to **45%** of the amount of HP healed.

612350.name: Dharma Rain
612350.desc: For each Abundance Blessing, increase allies' respective Max HP by **7%**. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).
612350.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Abundance the team has, the higher the characters' Max HP becomes.
612350.battleDesc: For each Abundance Blessing, increase allies' respective Max HP by **7%**. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).

612351.name: Dew Delight
612351.shortDesc: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.

612352.name: Extended Life
612352.desc: Upon entering battle, characters restore HP equal to **36%** of their Max HP.
612352.shortDesc: When entering battle, all characters restore HP.
612352.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, characters restore HP equal to **36%** of their Max HP.

612353.name: Mudra
612353.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to **24%** of their Max HP.
612353.shortDesc: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.
612353.battleDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to **24%** of their Max HP.

612354.name: Peril Parry
612354.desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by **36%** for **1** turn(s).
612354.shortDesc: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.
612354.battleDesc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by **36%** for **1** turn(s).

612355.name: Back to Life
612355.desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to **18%** of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
612355.shortDesc: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.
612355.battleDesc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to **18%** of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.

612356.name: Force Victoire
612356.desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by **15%** for **1** turn(s).
612356.shortDesc: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.
612356.battleDesc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by **15%** for **1** turn(s).

612357.name: Empower
612357.desc: After a character provides healing, there is a **45%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once per action.
612357.shortDesc: After restoring an ally's HP, there is a small chance of recovering a Skill Point.
612357.battleDesc: After a character provides healing, there is a **45%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once per action.

612420.name: The Hunt
612420.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies based on the current ATK of the character currently with the highest ATK.
612420.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Wind DMG to all enemy units based on the ATK of the character with the highest ATK on the team.
612420.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies based on the current ATK of the character currently with the highest ATK.

612421.name: Star Hunter
612421.desc: When using Path Resonance, the ally with the highest ATK will be given a turn instantly and be granted **Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow**, lasting until this ally uses any ability.
612421.shortDesc: When using the Path Resonance, the character with the highest ATK will instantly act and become **Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow**.
612421.battleDesc: When using Path Resonance, the ally with the highest ATK will be given a turn instantly and be granted **Light-Hunting Celestial Arrow**, lasting until this ally uses any ability.

612422.name: Bow and Arrow
612422.desc: When Path Resonance: The Hunt deals damage, enemies whose HP is lower than **50%** are guaranteed to receive CRIT Hits, with the CRIT DMG at **50%**. When the enemy is defeated, regenerates **50%** Energy.
612422.shortDesc: Attacks from Path Resonance: The Hunt are guaranteed to CRIT against enemies with HP lower than **50%**. Path Resonance: The Hunt regenerates energy if it defeats an enemy.
612422.battleDesc: When Path Resonance: The Hunt deals damage, enemies whose HP is lower than **50%** are guaranteed to receive CRIT Hits, with the CRIT DMG at **50%**. When the enemy is defeated, regenerates **50%** Energy.

612423.name: Perfect Aim
612423.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. When an ally's turn starts, additionally regenerates **3%** Energy for Path Resonance.
612423.shortDesc: Doubles the Energy limit of Path Resonance. Path Resonance regenerates Energy at the start of every character's turn.
612423.battleDesc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. When an ally's turn starts, additionally regenerates **3%** Energy for Path Resonance.

612424.name: Startling Breeze
612424.desc: After using Path Resonance, all allies' SPD increases by **25** for **2** turn(s). This effect also applies to units summoned by allies.
612424.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, increases all allies' SPD. This effect also applies to units summoned by allies.

612425.name: Shooting Starfire
612425.desc: After enemy target(s) are defeated by a Path Resonance, restores all allies' HP equal to **50%** of their respective Max HP.
612425.shortDesc: After a Path Resonance defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP.

612426.name: Solemn Snare
612426.desc: For every Skill Point recovered by allies, the next Path Resonance deals **20%** more DMG, stacking up to **8** time(s).
612426.shortDesc: Gaining Skill Points increases the DMG for Path Resonance's attack.

612427.name: Waiting with Drawn Bow
612427.desc: When using Path Resonance, allies' Shield duration extends by **5** turn(s).
612427.shortDesc: When using Path Resonance, extends characters' Shield duration.

612430.name: Empyrean Imperium
612430.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain **1** stack(s) of **Critical Boost** and increases the stack limit of **Critical Boost** to **12**.
612430.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, they gain **1** stack(s) of **Critical Boost** and raises the stack limit of **Critical Boost**.
612430.battleDesc: When a character's turn begins, they gain **1** stack(s) of **Critical Boost** and increases the stack limit of **Critical Boost** to **12**.

612431.name: Radiant Supreme
612431.desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain **7** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.
612431.shortDesc: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain **7** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.
612431.battleDesc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain **7** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.

612432.name: Sovereign Skybreaker
612432.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by **100%** and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by **75%**. If the Weakness Broken enemy is an Elite Enemy, then Action Advances for all allies.
612432.shortDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by **100%**, and the DMG dealt by their next attack increases. When an Elite Enemy's Weakness is Broken, the Advance Forward effect applies to all allies.
612432.battleDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by **100%** and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by **75%**. If the Weakness Broken enemy is an Elite Enemy, then Action Advances for all allies.

612440.name: Skyward Vendetta
612440.desc: If a character has higher than **100%** CRIT Rate and currently has **Critical Boost**, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds **100%**, CRIT DMG increases by **3%**. For every stack of **Critical Boost**, CRIT DMG increases by an extra **0%**. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to **200%**.
612440.shortDesc: When a character has **Critical Boost**, convert excess CRIT Rate into CRIT DMG based on the number of **Critical Boost** stacks.
612440.battleDesc: If a character has higher than **100%** CRIT Rate and currently has **Critical Boost**, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds **100%**, CRIT DMG increases by **3%**. For every stack of **Critical Boost**, CRIT DMG increases by an extra **0%**. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to **200%**.

612441.name: Archery Duel
612441.desc: When a character's turn begins, or after they used their Ultimate, restores the character's HP equal to **5%** of their Max HP for every stack of **Critical Boost**.
612441.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, or after they use their Ultimate, they restore HP based on the number of **Critical Boost** stacks they have.
612441.battleDesc: When a character's turn begins, or after they used their Ultimate, restores the character's HP equal to **5%** of their Max HP for every stack of **Critical Boost**.

612442.name: Adept's Bow
612442.desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a follow-up attack, they can inherit **Critical Boost**, and the number of **Critical Boost** stacks increases by **1**.
612442.shortDesc: Follow-up attacks and Ultimates can inherit and increase **Critical Boost** stacks.
612442.battleDesc: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a follow-up attack, they can inherit **Critical Boost**, and the number of **Critical Boost** stacks increases by **1**.

612443.name: Mistwraith Pursuit
612443.desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by **40%**. This effect can stack up to **2** times and gives a **50%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.
612443.shortDesc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases, and there's a chance of recovering a Skill Point.
612443.battleDesc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by **40%**. This effect can stack up to **2** times and gives a **50%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.

612444.name: Starlit Hunt
612444.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, regenerates Energy equal to **100%** of the character's Max Energy.
612444.shortDesc: After a character defeats an enemy, they regenerate Energy to Max Energy.
612444.battleDesc: When a character defeats an enemy, regenerates Energy equal to **100%** of the character's Max Energy.

612445.name: Borisin Chase
612445.desc: After every **6** turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, **5** turn(s) are considered to have already passed.
612445.shortDesc: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. Upon entering a battle, a certain number of turns is considered to have already passed.
612445.battleDesc: After every **6** turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, **5** turn(s) are considered to have already passed.

612446.name: Rainbow Fang
612446.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP equal to **18%** of their Max HP. When a character defeats an enemy, restores HP equal to **48%** of their Max HP.
612446.shortDesc: After a character Breaks the Weakness of an enemy or defeats an enemy, restores the character's HP.
612446.battleDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP equal to **18%** of their Max HP. When a character defeats an enemy, restores HP equal to **48%** of their Max HP.

612450.name: Vermeil Bow and White Arrow
612450.desc: For every Blessing from The Hunt, increases SPD by **4%**. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).
612450.shortDesc: The more Blessings of The Hunt the team has, the higher the characters' SPD becomes.
612450.battleDesc: For every Blessing from The Hunt, increases SPD by **4%**. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).

612453.name: Thundering Chariot
612453.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by **30%**.
612453.shortDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.
612453.battleDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by **30%**.

612454.name: Constellation Surge
612454.desc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD increases by **45%** until they are attacked.
612454.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD is increased until they are attacked.
612454.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, characters' SPD increases by **45%** until they are attacked.

612455.name: Astral Menace
612455.desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by **12%**.
612455.shortDesc: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.
612455.battleDesc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by **12%**.

612456.name: Arboreal Volley
612456.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate **6** Energy.
612456.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.
612456.battleDesc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate **6** Energy.

612457.name: Arrow Shades Bow
612457.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to **15%** of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
612457.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.
612457.battleDesc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to **15%** of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.

612520.name: Destruction
612520.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies based on the current HP difference between Max HP and current HP for all allies combined.
612520.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, deals Fire DMG to all enemies based on the HP difference between all allies' Max HP and their current HP.
612520.battleDesc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and resonate with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies based on the current HP difference between Max HP and current HP for all allies combined.

612521.name: Cataclysmic Variable
612521.desc: Using a Path Resonance will consume HP from all allies until their HP is equal to **40%** of their respective Max HP, increasing the DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction by **20%**. The amount of HP consumed will be converted into a Shield lasting for **2** turn(s), with the same Shield value as the HP lost.
612521.shortDesc: After using the Path Resonance, consume characters' HP and turn the value into Shields. The DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction increases.
612521.battleDesc: Using a Path Resonance will consume HP from all allies until their HP is equal to **40%** of their respective Max HP, increasing the DMG of Path Resonance: Destruction by **20%**. The amount of HP consumed will be converted into a Shield lasting for **2** turn(s), with the same Shield value as the HP lost.

612522.name: Extreme Helium Flash
612522.desc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a **150%** base chance to inflict **Entropic Retribution** on the enemy target for **2** turn(s).
612522.shortDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a high chance to apply **Entropic Retribution** on enemies.
612522.battleDesc: The attacks of Path Resonance: Destruction have a **150%** base chance to inflict **Entropic Retribution** on the enemy target for **2** turn(s).

612523.name: Event Horizon
612523.desc: When an ally whose current HP percentage is below **35%** gets attacked, automatically releases 1 Path Resonance without consuming Energy. This effect can be triggered up to a max of **2** time(s) in a single battle and cannot be triggered multiple times by the same attack.
612523.shortDesc: When a character is hit and their HP is lower than **35%** of their Max HP, Path Resonance will be used 1 time at no cost.
612523.battleDesc: When an ally whose current HP percentage is below **35%** gets attacked, automatically releases 1 Path Resonance without consuming Energy. This effect can be triggered up to a max of **2** time(s) in a single battle and cannot be triggered multiple times by the same attack.

612524.name: Substellar Belt
612524.desc: Using Path Resonance will cause any character with current HP percentage lower than **50%** to gain a Shield equal to **40%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612524.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, grants a Shield to a character with current HP percentage lower than **50%**.

612525.name: Zero Age Main Sequence
612525.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, regenerates **5%** Energy for Path Resonance. If the character's current HP percentage is lower than **50%**, additionally regenerates **5%** Energy for Path Resonance.
612525.shortDesc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance regenerates Energy. If the character's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, increases the amount of Energy regenerated.

612526.name: Nuclear Implosion
612526.desc: When using Path Resonance to attack, additionally deals a set amount of DMG to all enemy targets whose HP is below **20%** of their Max HP, reducing these targets' HP to 1.
612526.shortDesc: When using Path Resonance to attack, if an enemy's HP percentage is lower than **20%** of their Max HP, their remaining HP is reduced to 1.

612527.name: Protostar
612527.desc: After losing HP due to allies or Path Resonance effects, the characters gain Healing Over Time that lasts **2** turn(s). At the start of every turn, restore HP equal to **30%** of the consumed HP.
612527.shortDesc: When characters lose HP due to allies or Path Resonance effects, they restore HP over time.

612530.name: Non-Inverse Antimatter Equation
612530.desc: If a character's current HP percentage is below **50%**, they are considered to have **20** extra stacks of **Grit**. For every **10%** further HP lost, gains **2** extra stack(s) of **Grit**.
612530.shortDesc: If a character's current HP percentage is below **50%**, they are considered to have extra stacks of **Grit**. The lower the character's HP is, the higher the stack becomes.
612530.battleDesc: If a character's current HP percentage is below **50%**, they are considered to have **20** extra stacks of **Grit**. For every **10%** further HP lost, gains **2** extra stack(s) of **Grit**.

612531.name: Universal Heat Death Characteristic
612531.desc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, the character gains **4** stacks of **Grit**, and adjacent allies gain **1** stacks of **Grit**. When the turn ends, the character loses **4** stacks of **Grit**.
612531.shortDesc: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, they gain **4** stack(s) of **Grit**, and any adjacent characters gain **1** stack(s) of **Grit**.
612531.battleDesc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, the character gains **4** stacks of **Grit**, and adjacent allies gain **1** stacks of **Grit**. When the turn ends, the character loses **4** stacks of **Grit**.

612532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
612532.desc: Receives **15%** less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
612532.shortDesc: All allies split incoming DMG, and reduces the DMG taken by targeted character.
612532.battleDesc: Receives **15%** less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.

612540.name: Incremental Doomsday
612540.desc: After being hit, for each stack of **Grit** the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **4%** of their ATK plus **2%** of the current HP loss to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.
612540.shortDesc: After a character is hit, deal Additional DMG to the attacker based on their **Grit** stack, and the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612540.battleDesc: After being hit, for each stack of **Grit** the character has, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **4%** of their ATK plus **2%** of the current HP loss to the attacker. This DMG will not be able to defeat the enemy.

612541.name: Catastrophic Resonance
612541.desc: If a character attacks while having **Grit**, consumes HP equal to **10%** of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the HP lost. For each stack of **Grit**, deals Additional DMG equal to **1%** of the HP lost.
612541.shortDesc: After a character attacks, consume their own HP and deal Additional DMG based on the **Grit** stack, and the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612541.battleDesc: If a character attacks while having **Grit**, consumes HP equal to **10%** of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the HP lost. For each stack of **Grit**, deals Additional DMG equal to **1%** of the HP lost.

612542.name: Indicative Depth of Field
612542.desc: For each stack of **Grit**, reduces the DMG taken by characters by **1%**. **Grit** can stack up to **45** time(s).
612542.shortDesc: The higher the **Grit** stacks are, the less DMG the character takes. **Grit** stack limit also increases.
612542.battleDesc: For each stack of **Grit**, reduces the DMG taken by characters by **1%**. **Grit** can stack up to **45** time(s).

612543.name: Devastating Accretion
612543.desc: For every 1% of a character's Max HP that is lost, their ATK increases by **1%** and DEF by **1%**.
612543.shortDesc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their ATK and DEF become.
612543.battleDesc: For every 1% of a character's Max HP that is lost, their ATK increases by **1%** and DEF by **1%**.

612544.name: Destructive Flare
612544.desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, deals **50%** increased DMG. When HP's lower than **35%**, DMG dealt further increases by **20%**.
612544.shortDesc: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than **50%**, they deal increased DMG. When their HP is lower than **35%**, they deal further increased DMG.
612544.battleDesc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, deals **50%** increased DMG. When HP's lower than **35%**, DMG dealt further increases by **20%**.

612545.name: Disciplinary Flicker
612545.desc: If a character's HP percentage is lower than **35%** after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by **12%** of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than **20%**.
612545.shortDesc: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP percentage is lower than **35%**. The lower their HP is, the more HP is restored.
612545.battleDesc: If a character's HP percentage is lower than **35%** after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by **12%** of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than **20%**.

612546.name: Hazardous Lucent Residue
612546.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **25%** of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, plus **7%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612546.shortDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield based on the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP.
612546.battleDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **25%** of the HP difference between their Max HP and current HP, plus **7%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612550.name: Primordial Black Hole
612550.desc: Characters gain a **7%** ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).
612550.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Destruction the team has, the higher the characters' ATK becomes.
612550.battleDesc: Characters gain a **7%** ATK increase for each Destruction Blessing. This effect can stack up to a max of **9** time(s).

612551.name: Reflection
612551.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by **30%** of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect **1** time(s) per battle.
612551.shortDesc: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.
612551.battleDesc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by **30%** of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect **1** time(s) per battle.

612553.name: Instability Strip
612553.desc: When characters are hit or have lost HP, **6** Energy is regenerated.
612553.shortDesc: When characters are hit or are losing HP, their Energy is regenerated.
612553.battleDesc: When characters are hit or have lost HP, **6** Energy is regenerated.

612554.name: Metric Reservation
612554.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **54%** the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
612554.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield based on the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP.
612554.battleDesc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **54%** the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).

612555.name: Sentinel Satellite
612555.desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **30%** of their Max HP for **2** turn(s). This effect can only be triggered **1** time(s) by each character per battle.
612555.shortDesc: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than **50%**, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.
612555.battleDesc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **30%** of their Max HP for **2** turn(s). This effect can only be triggered **1** time(s) by each character per battle.

612556.name: Polarization Receptor
612556.desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by **1%**.
612556.shortDesc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their DEF becomes.
612556.battleDesc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their DEF increases by **1%**.

612557.name: Eternally Collapsing Object
612557.desc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by **0%**.
612557.shortDesc: The lower a character's current HP is, the higher their Effect RES becomes.
612557.battleDesc: For every 1% of HP lost by a character, their Effect RES increases by **0%**.

612620.name: Elation
612620.desc: Can consume **100** points of Energy to use the ability and resonate with the Path of Elation, dealing follow-up attack DMG of a random Type to all enemies for **3** ‚Äì **5** time(s).
612620.shortDesc: After using Path Resonance, deals follow-up attack DMG of a random Type to all enemies for a random number of times.
612620.battleDesc: Can consume **100** points of Energy to use the ability and resonate with the Path of Elation, dealing follow-up attack DMG of a random Type to all enemies for **3** ‚Äì **5** time(s).

612621.name: Doomsday Carnival
612621.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, there is a **150%** base chance to apply **Sensory Pursuit** to enemies for 1 turn.
612621.shortDesc: Every time Path Resonance deals DMG, there is a high chance to apply **Sensory Pursuit** to the target enemy.
612621.battleDesc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, there is a **150%** base chance to apply **Sensory Pursuit** to enemies for 1 turn.

612622.name: Dance of Growth
612622.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. Using abilities to resonate with a Path will consume all Energy. For every **20%** Energy consumed that exceeds the original limit, attacks will deal DMG for 1 extra time.
612622.shortDesc: Doubles the Energy limit of Path Resonance. When using Path Resonance, consume all Energy to increase the number of damaging hits from the Resonance.
612622.battleDesc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. Using abilities to resonate with a Path will consume all Energy. For every **20%** Energy consumed that exceeds the original limit, attacks will deal DMG for 1 extra time.

612623.name: Instant Win
612623.desc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **5%** Energy.
612623.shortDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonances regenerates energy. When characters launch follow-up attacks, Path Resonances regenerates energy.
612623.battleDesc: When entering battle, Path Resonance regenerates **40%** Energy. When a character launches a follow-up attack, Path Resonance additionally regenerates **5%** Energy.

612624.name: The Taste of Anglerfish
612624.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels 1 debuff on 1 ally.
612624.shortDesc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals DMG, randomly dispels the debuffs on a character.

612625.name: Guinea Pig in Ice Coffin
612625.desc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a **150%** base chance to Freeze the enemy target for **1** turn(s).
612625.shortDesc: When Path Resonance: Elation deals Ice DMG, there is a high chance to Freeze the enemy.

612626.name: Unending Night
612626.desc: When Path Resonance deals Fire/Wind/Physical/Lightning DMG, there is a **50%** base chance to apply a DoT of the same Type, lasting for **1** turns.
612626.shortDesc: When the Path Resonance deals Fire, Wind, Physical or Lightning DMG, there is a chance inflict the DoT effect of the same type.

612627.name: Pit and Pendulum
612627.desc: When using the Path Resonance, for every **20** Energy consumed, the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies will have their action Advanced Forward by **10%**.
612627.shortDesc: Based on the amount of Energy used, Path Resonance advances the actions of the ally with the highest ATK and all units summoned by allies.

612630.name: Whitest Night**
612630.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **60%** of their ATK for **1** ‚Äì **3** time(s). Moreover, increases **Aftertaste** DMG by **35%**.
612630.shortDesc: After characters launch Follow-up ATK, deal **Aftertaste** DMG **1** ‚Äî **3** time(s) and increase **Aftertaste** DMG.
612630.battleDesc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, they deal **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **60%** of their ATK for **1** ‚Äì **3** time(s). Moreover, increases **Aftertaste** DMG by **35%**.

612631.name: Rest in Peace**
612631.desc: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **80%** of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for **2** extra time(s).
612631.shortDesc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, deals **Aftertaste** DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG **2** extra time(s).
612631.battleDesc: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **80%** of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for **2** extra time(s).

612632.name: Cat's Cradle**
612632.desc: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as follow-up attack. Increases DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by **55%**.
612632.shortDesc: Characters' Ultimates are considered as a follow-up attack. Follow-up attacks deal increased DMG.
612632.battleDesc: When a character uses Ultimate to deal DMG to an enemy target, it is considered as follow-up attack. Increases DMG dealt by follow-up attacks by **55%**.

612640.name: **Portrait of A Man On Fire**
612640.desc: When causing **Aftertaste** DMG to an enemy, characters deal extra **Aftertaste** DMG of different Types for **1** time(s), at DMG values equal to **90%** of the original DMG.
612640.shortDesc: Every time enemies receive **Aftertaste** DMG, they also receive extra **Aftertaste** DMG **1** time(s).
612640.battleDesc: When causing **Aftertaste** DMG to an enemy, characters deal extra **Aftertaste** DMG of different Types for **1** time(s), at DMG values equal to **90%** of the original DMG.

612641.name: **Just Keep on Crying!**
612641.desc: For every 1 Type of **Aftertaste** DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by **12%** until the end of their next action.
612641.shortDesc: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from **Aftertaste**, the more DMG they receive.
612641.battleDesc: For every 1 Type of **Aftertaste** DMG the enemy received, increases the DMG taken by them by **12%** until the end of their next action.

612642.name: **The Hourglass Kindergarten**
612642.desc: For every 1 Type of **Aftertaste** DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by **6%** until the end of their next action.
612642.shortDesc: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from **Aftertaste**, the more their ATK is reduced.
612642.battleDesc: For every 1 Type of **Aftertaste** DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by **6%** until the end of their next action.

612643.name: **The Painted Albatross**
612643.desc: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **36%** of their ATK to all enemies hit.
612643.shortDesc: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by Follow-up ATK.
612643.battleDesc: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **36%** of their ATK to all enemies hit.

612644.name: ****12** Monkeys and Angry Men**
612644.desc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, the follow-up attack DMG within this attack increases by **6%**.
612644.shortDesc: The DMG dealt by characters within a single follow-up attack increases gradually.
612644.battleDesc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, the follow-up attack DMG within this attack increases by **6%**.

612645.name: **Aiden Gravitational Rainbow**
612645.desc: When characters launch follow-up attacks on enemies, the attacked enemies' actions are delayed by **12%**, and there is a **10%** base chance to cause Imprisonment on the enemies, lasting for **1** turn(s).
612645.shortDesc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, the target enemy's action is delayed, and there is a low chance of applying Imprisonment on them.
612645.battleDesc: When characters launch follow-up attacks on enemies, the attacked enemies' actions are delayed by **12%**, and there is a **10%** base chance to cause Imprisonment on the enemies, lasting for **1** turn(s).

612646.name: **Twenty-First Military Rule**
612646.desc: After a character launches follow-up attacks, there is a **100%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
612646.shortDesc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, Skill Point recovery is guaranteed.
612646.battleDesc: After a character launches follow-up attacks, there is a **100%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

612650.name: **Exemplary Conduct**
612650.desc: For each Elation Blessing in possession, increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by **12%**. This effect can stack up to **9** time(s).
612650.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Elation the team has, the higher the follow-up attack DMG becomes.
612650.battleDesc: For each Elation Blessing in possession, increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by **12%**. This effect can stack up to **9** time(s).

612651.name: **Mostly Harmful**
612651.desc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by **50%** when characters deal follow-up attack DMG.
612651.shortDesc: Follow-up attacks' Weakness Break Efficiency increases.
612651.battleDesc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by **50%** when characters deal follow-up attack DMG.

612652.name: **Suspiria**
612652.desc: Increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by **39%**.
612652.battleDesc: Increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by **39%**.

612653.name: **Pale Fire**
612653.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by **39%**.
612653.battleDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate for follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by **39%**.

612654.name: **Back to the Lighthouse**
612654.desc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a follow-up attack, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by **36%**.
612654.shortDesc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, their Energy Regeneration Rate increases.
612654.battleDesc: When a character deals DMG to an enemy with a follow-up attack, increases their Energy Regeneration Rate by **36%**.

612655.name: **Doctor of Love**
612655.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by **15%** of their Max HP.
612655.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they restore HP.
612655.battleDesc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by **15%** of their Max HP.

612656.name: **Platinum Age**
612656.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by **40%** for **2** turn(s).
612656.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their DEF increases.
612656.battleDesc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by **40%** for **2** turn(s).

612657.name: **Clockwork Apple**
612657.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by **16%** for **2** turn(s).
612657.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their SPD increases.
612657.battleDesc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by **16%** for **2** turn(s).

612720.name: Propagation
