612720.desc: Consumes **100** Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover **2** Skill Point(s) and become affected by **Metamorphosis**. **Metamorphosis** lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.
612720.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, a target ally immediately takes action, recovering **2** Skill Point(s) and activating **Metamorphosis**.
612720.battleDesc: Consumes **100** Energy to resonate with the Path of Propagation and allows a target ally to immediately take action, recover **2** Skill Point(s) and become affected by **Metamorphosis**. **Metamorphosis** lasts for 1 turn and only takes effect on the latest target.

612721.name: Proboscis
612721.desc: Extends the duration of **Metamorphosis** for 1 turn. After a character with **Metamorphosis** defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates **20%** Energy.
612721.shortDesc: The duration of **Metamorphosis** is extended for 1 turn. After a character with **Metamorphosis** defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates Energy.
612721.battleDesc: Extends the duration of **Metamorphosis** for 1 turn. After a character with **Metamorphosis** defeats an enemy, Path Resonance regenerates **20%** Energy.

612722.name: Phenol Compounds
612722.desc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates **1%** Energy for Path Resonance.
612722.shortDesc: Path Resonance's Energy limit is doubled. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, Path Resonance regenerates energy.
612722.battleDesc: Increase the Energy limit of Path Resonance from **100** to **200** points. After a character consumes or recovers Skill Points, additionally regenerates **1%** Energy for Path Resonance.

612723.name: Crystal Pincers
612723.desc: **Metamorphosis** additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by **40%**. Only when a character is under the **Metamorphosis** effect can they cause **Spores** to burst. Every time a character causes 1 **Spore** to burst, additionally deals Basic ATK DMG equal to **80%** of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to **3** time(s) on the same target.
612723.shortDesc: Increases DMG dealt by characters with **Metamorphosis**. Only this type of character can cause **Spores** to burst, dealing additional DMG after bursting.
612723.battleDesc: **Metamorphosis** additionally increases DMG dealt by a character by **40%**. Only when a character is under the **Metamorphosis** effect can they cause **Spores** to burst. Every time a character causes 1 **Spore** to burst, additionally deals Basic ATK DMG equal to **80%** of the character's ATK. This effect can trigger up to **3** time(s) on the same target.

612724.name: Superposition Eye
612724.desc: After using Path Resonance, nullifies all DMG received by a single target ally except DoT. This status is dispelled after being attacked. If the target ally's current HP percentage is lower than **50%** when Path Resonance is used, it will additionally recover **1** Skill Point(s).
612724.shortDesc: After using a Path Resonance, make a target ally able to Block 1 attack. If that ally's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, recover **1** Skill Point(s).

612725.name: Adherent Microbial Mat
612725.desc: When using Path Resonance, a single target ally gains a Shield equal to **60%** of Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).
612725.shortDesc: When using a Path Resonance, grants Shield to a target ally.

612726.name: Compounded Macrospore
612726.desc: When using Path Resonance, heals the target ally for **50%** of their Max HP. **200%** of the healing that exceeds Max HP will be evenly distributed among other characters.
612726.shortDesc: When using Path Resonance, heals a target ally. Any exceeded Healing will be distributed to heal other allies.

612727.name: Condensation Cavity
612727.desc: Characters in the **Metamorphosis** status deal **20%** more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a **10%** base chance to Freeze hit targets for **1** turns.
612727.shortDesc: Characters in the **Metamorphosis** state deal more DMG to Frozen enemies. In addition, their attacks have a low chance of Freezing the target.

612730.name: Spore Discharge
612730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain **1** **Spores**. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).
612730.shortDesc: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive **Spores**. If Skill Points are consumed to 0, increases the character's SPD.
612730.battleDesc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain **1** **Spores**. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).

612731.name: Fungal Pustule
612731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s). The max number of **Spores** that can be possessed increases to **9**.
612731.shortDesc: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive **Spores**. Increases the number of **Spores** they can bear.
612731.battleDesc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s). The max number of **Spores** that can be possessed increases to **9**.

612732.name: Scythe Limbs
612732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **45%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.
612732.shortDesc: After a character uses the Ultimate, consuming or recovering Skill Points will be considered as additionally consuming or recovering 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes or recovers, the higher their CRIT DMG.
612732.battleDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **45%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.

612740.name: Putrefaction Ulcer
612740.desc: Changes the number of times **Spores** can spread after bursting to **3** times. Can also spread to the original bearer of **Spores**.
612740.shortDesc: The number of times **Spores** can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.
612740.battleDesc: Changes the number of times **Spores** can spread after bursting to **3** times. Can also spread to the original bearer of **Spores**.

612741.name: Lytic Enzyme
612741.desc: Increases the DMG caused by **Spores** bursting. The DMG increased is equal to **50%** of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the **Spores** they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.
612741.shortDesc: Increases DMG dealt by **Spores**. After an enemy is defeated, other enemies will receive its **Spores**.
612741.battleDesc: Increases the DMG caused by **Spores** bursting. The DMG increased is equal to **50%** of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the **Spores** they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.

612742.name: Metabolic Cavity
612742.desc: For each **Spore** possessed by all enemies, reduces the DMG received by all allies by **1%**, After the **Spores** burst, heals the ally with the lowest HP percentage by **12%** of their Max HP.
612742.shortDesc: Based on the total number of **Spores** on enemies, lowers DMG received by a character. After **Spores** burst, restores the HP of the character with the lowest HP percentage.
612742.battleDesc: For each **Spore** possessed by all enemies, reduces the DMG received by all allies by **1%**, After the **Spores** burst, heals the ally with the lowest HP percentage by **12%** of their Max HP.

612743.name: Excitatory Gland
612743.desc: If the Skill Point is 0 when using Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point and has a **50%** fixed chance of further recovering 1 Skill Point.
612743.shortDesc: Upon using a Basic ATK, should your Skill Points be 0, you will additionally recover 1 Skill Point and have a random chance to recover another 1 thereafter.
612743.battleDesc: If the Skill Point is 0 when using Basic ATK, additionally recovers 1 Skill Point and has a **50%** fixed chance of further recovering 1 Skill Point.

612744.name: Exposed Brain Matter
612744.desc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to **35%** of the original DMG to adjacent targets.
612744.shortDesc: Basic ATK DMG will Blast adjacent targets.
612744.battleDesc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to **35%** of the original DMG to adjacent targets.

612745.name: Intersegmental Membrane
612745.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by **8%** for **1** turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to **3** time(s).
612745.shortDesc: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.
612745.battleDesc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by **8%** for **1** turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to **3** time(s).

612746.name: Catalyst
612746.desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by **30%** for **1** turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to **3** time(s).
612746.shortDesc: If, after a character uses their Skill, the Skill does not initiate an attack, increases the DMG of all allies.
612746.battleDesc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by **30%** for **1** turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to **3** time(s).

612750.name: Osseus Blade
612750.desc: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by **12%**. This effect can stack up to **9** time(s).
612750.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Propagation the team has, the higher Basic ATK DMG becomes.
612750.battleDesc: For each Blessing of Propagation in possession, increases all characters' Basic ATK DMG by **12%**. This effect can stack up to **9** time(s).

612751.name: Spinal Spur
612751.desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **36%**.
612751.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Characters' Basic ATK.
612751.battleDesc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **36%**.

612752.name: Channeled Needle
612752.desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **60%**.
612752.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Characters' Basic ATK
612752.battleDesc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **60%**.

612753.name: Conjunctiva
612753.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by **40%** for **2** turn(s).
612753.shortDesc: When a character uses a Basic ATK, their DEF increases.
612753.battleDesc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by **40%** for **2** turn(s).

612754.name: Scaled Wing
612754.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by **16%** for **2** turn(s).
612754.shortDesc: When a character launches a Basic ATK, their SPD increases.
612754.battleDesc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by **16%** for **2** turn(s).

612755.name: Compound Eye
612755.desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to **5** time(s) across all allies.
612755.shortDesc: After entering battle, allies will recover Skill Points during the first **5** actions.
612755.battleDesc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to **5** time(s) across all allies.

612756.name: Sporangium
612756.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates **4** extra Energy.
612756.shortDesc: Characters regenerate Energy when consuming Skill Points.
612756.battleDesc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates **4** extra Energy.

612757.name: Vesicle
612757.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to **15%** of their Max HP.
612757.shortDesc: Characters restore HP when consuming Skill Points
612757.battleDesc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to **15%** of their Max HP.

612820.name: "Erudition"
612820.desc: Consume **100** Energy to resonate with the Path of Erudition. Path Resonance links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting **Synapse Resonance** on all enemies and dealing Imaginary DMG to them.
612820.shortDesc: Path Resonance inflicts **Synapse Resonance** on all enemies and deal Imaginary DMG to them.

612821.name: Melt Core
612821.desc: When an enemy target with **Synapse Resonance** is attacked by Ultimate, the enemy target with the highest Max HP takes increased DMG equal to **50%** of the attacking character's ATK.
612821.shortDesc: When **Synapse Resonance** is triggered by an Ultimate, it will deal more DMG to the enemy with the highest Max HP.

612822.name: Chain Contagion
612822.desc: When characters defeat an enemy with **Synapse Resonance**, the effect is additionally triggered for **2** time(s).
612822.shortDesc: When characters defeat an enemy with **Synapse Resonance**, the effect is additionally triggered for **2** time(s).

612823.name: Memetic Inversion
612823.desc: When an enemy target appears, regenerates Path Resonance Energy equal to **5%** of the combined Max Energy of all characters.
612823.shortDesc: Regenerates Path Resonance Energy upon encountering enemies.

612826.name: Full Scan
612826.desc: When enemies with **Synapse Resonance** are attacked by follow-up attacks, the effect is additionally triggered 1 time and the available **Synapse Resonance** count is not reduced.
612826.shortDesc: When enemies with **Synapse Resonance** are attacked by follow-up attacks, the effect is additionally triggered once and its available count is not reduced.

612827.name: Data Reinforcement
612827.desc: Attacks against Weakness Broken enemies do not reduce the available **Synapse Resonance** count.
612827.shortDesc: Attacks against Weakness Broken enemies do not reduce the available **Synapse Resonance** count.

612830.name: BCI**-34** Gray Matter
612830.desc: When entering battle, charges **Brain in a Vat** by **100%**. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge **Brain in a Vat** by **40%** or **5%** respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.
612830.shortDesc: When entering battle, charges the **Brain in a Vat**. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies charges the **Brain in a Vat**.

612831.name: SMR-2 Amygdala
612831.desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the **Brain in a Vat** by **50%**. When the **Brain in a Vat** is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).
612831.shortDesc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the **Brain in a Vat**. Every time the **Brain in a Vat** is fully charged, gains a SPD bonus.

612832.name: VEP**-18** Occipital Lobe
612832.desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **25%**. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by **3%**.
612832.shortDesc: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. In this battle, the bigger the maximum number of enemy targets an Ultimate hits in a single attack, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG.

612840.name: Vestibular System
612840.desc: When characters use Ultimates via **Brain in a Vat**, their CRIT DMG increases by **90%**. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.
612840.shortDesc: Ultimates cast with the **Brain in a Vat** deals more CRIT DMG. This CRIT DMG bonus lasts until the end of the next ATK.

612841.name: Transmitter Synthesis
612841.desc: For every 1 Energy that exceeds the characters' Max Energy, charges **Brain in a Vat** by **1%**.
612841.shortDesc: When the character's Energy exceeds the limit, the exceeded Energy charges the **Brain in a Vat**.

612842.name: Explicit Memory
612842.desc: After characters use their Ultimate via **Brain in a Vat**, they gain a Shield equal in strength to **45%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turns.
612842.shortDesc: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the **Brain in a Vat**.

612843.name: Tactile Pathway
612843.desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by **20%** of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.
612843.shortDesc: After characters use an attack, deal additional DMG based on the number of enemies attacked and the number of enemies defeated during the entire battle.

612844.name: Subliminal Sensation
612844.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **50%**. After entering battle, regenerates energy equal to **100%** of the character's Max Energy.
612844.shortDesc: Increase Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.

612845.name: Striated Cortex
612845.desc: If characters' **AoE ATK** ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to **60%** of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
612845.shortDesc: If characters' **AoE** ability only attacks one enemy, the ability deals a set amount of extra DMG based on the original ability DMG.

612846.name: Saltatory Conduction
612846.desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by **24%**. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to **3** times.
612846.shortDesc: Ultimate attacks delay all Weakness Broken enemies' actions.

612850.name: Throne of Engaged Gears
612850.desc: For every Blessing of Erudition currently in possession, Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **10%**, stacking up to **9** times.
612850.shortDesc: The more Blessings of Erudition the team has, the higher the Ultimate DMG dealt by characters becomes.

612851.name: Ring of Bent Wires
612851.desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **27%**.

612852.name: Scepter of Energy Torque
612852.desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **45%**.

612853.name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
612853.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal **75%** more DMG.
612853.shortDesc: Increases the DMG of the characters' next attack following their Ultimate.

612854.name: Candle of Delayed Diffraction
612854.desc: After characters use an **AoE ATK** ability, their ATK increases by **40%**, lasting for **3** turn(s).
612854.shortDesc: Characters' ATK increases after using an **AoE ATK** ability.

612855.name: Canopy of Mottled Metal
612855.desc: After characters use an **AoE ATK** ability, their DEF increases by **40%**, lasting for **3** turn(s).
612855.shortDesc: Characters' DEF increases after using an **AoE ATK** ability.

612856.name: Garment of Coiled Wires
612856.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to **24%** of their Max HP.
612856.shortDesc: Characters restore HP after using their Ultimate.

612857.name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
612857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to **100%** of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
612857.shortDesc: Characters can resist fatal DMG and can consume Energy to restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

615020.name: The Architects
615020.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Preservation. Provides all allies with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **80%** of their respective Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s). Based on the total Shield Effect of all allies, deals Physical DMG to all enemies.
615020.shortDesc: After triggering Boundary Equation, provides a Shield for all allies. Based on the total Shield Effect of all allies, deals Physical DMG to all enemies.

615030.name: Resonance Transfer
615030.desc: After a character launches an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **100%** of the character's current Shield Effect plus **20%** of the total Shield Effect of the character's teammates to the hit enemies.
615030.shortDesc: After attacking enemies, the attacking character deals **Quake** DMG based on the current total Shield Effect on the ally team.

615031.name: Metastatic Field
615031.desc: After a character is attacked, deals **Quake** DMG to the attacker, equal to **420%** of the character's Shield Effect just before the attack. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy.
615031.shortDesc: After a character is hit by an attack, deals **Quake** DMG to the enemy target based on the total Shield Effect on the character before they were hit.

615032.name: Macrosegregation
615032.desc: Characters gain a special Shield. When characters obtain other Shields, this special Shield will increase by **100%** of the new Shield Effect. At the start of the character's turn, lose **85%** of the Shield Effect that exceeds **45%** of the character's Max HP.
615032.shortDesc: Characters gains a special stackable Shield. When a turn begins, the Shield loses a certain amount of Shield Effect.

615040.name: Shear Structure
615040.desc: Characters deal **15%** increased **Quake** DMG to their target, and other targets also take **Quake** DMG equal to **30%** of DMG dealt to the primary target enemy.
615040.shortDesc: **Quake** DMG increases and is Blasted to all enemies.

615041.name: Solid Solution
615041.desc: Deals increased **Quake** DMG to enemies. The amount of DMG increased is equal to **120%** of the character's current DEF.
615041.shortDesc: The DMG **Quake** deals increases with the character's DEF.

615042.name: Safe Load
615042.desc: Shielded characters increase their ATK by **60%** of the Shield Effect on them, up to a maximum of **160%** of their Base ATK.
615042.shortDesc: Shielded characters increase their ATK based on the max DMG that can be absorbed by their current Shields.

615043.name: Sanctuary
615043.desc: At the end of the turn, characters gain a Shield that can block DMG equal to **15%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s).
615043.shortDesc: Characters receive a Shield at the end of the turn.

615044.name: Quadrangular Pyramid
615044.desc: When characters' gain a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield by **35%**.
615044.shortDesc: When a character receives a Shield, increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield.

615045.name: Hypereutectoid
615045.desc: When a character provides Shields to an ally, both units will increase their DMG dealt by **30%**, stacking up to **5** time(s), lasting for **1** turn(s).
615045.shortDesc: When a character provides Shield to an ally, the DMG dealt by both characters increases. This effect is stackable.

615046.name: Inversion Cube
615046.desc: Increases CRIT Rate of **Quake** DMG dealt by characters by **30%** and CRIT DMG by **75%**.
615046.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of the **Quake** dealt by characters.

615051.name: Sentinel
615051.desc: Upon entering battle, characters gain a Shield equal to **24%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615051.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, all characters gain a Shield.

615052.name: Patch
615052.desc: After a character is attacked, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of the HP lost during this attack, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615052.shortDesc: After being hit, characters gain a Shield based on the HP lost in this attack.

615053.name: Compensation
615053.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, characters gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **18%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).
615053.shortDesc: When a character inflicts Weakness Break on a target, the character gains a Shield.

615055.name: Rotation
615055.desc: When a character gains a Shield, there is a **30%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff that is currently placed on the character.
615055.shortDesc: When a character receives a Shield, there is a small chance of removing a debuff currently on them.

615056.name: Burst
615056.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Shielded characters by **45%**.
615056.shortDesc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT DMG.

615057.name: Concentration
615057.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Shielded characters by **24%**.
615057.shortDesc: Shielded Characters have increased CRIT Rate.

615120.name: Garden of Recollection
615120.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Remembrance, dealing Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing all enemies for **2** turn(s).
615120.shortDesc: After triggering the Boundary Equation, deal Ice DMG to all enemies with a high chance of Freezing them for **2** turn(s).

615130.name: Fuli
615130.desc: When attacking Frozen enemies, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** to the enemy for **1** turn(s). Additionally deals **20%** more DMG dealt when **Dissociation** is removed
615130.shortDesc: After attacking a Frozen enemy, apply **Dissociation** on them and deal extra DMG.

615131.name: Innocence
615131.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, there is a **100%** base chance to apply **Dissociation** on the enemy for **1** turn(s). This effect ignores enemies' chance to resist Frozen.
615131.shortDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, ignore the enemy's Freeze RES and apply **Dissociation** on them.

615132.name: Reticence
615132.desc: After an enemy is attacked **5** time(s), they have a **150%** base chance to become Frozen for **1** turn(s).
615132.shortDesc: The enemy has a high chance to become Frozen for every **5** attack(s) it receives.

615140.name: Dizziness
615140.desc: Increases the DMG taken by enemies with **Dissociation** by **54%**. This effect will remain for 1 turn after **Dissociation** is removed.

615141.name: Insensitivity
615141.desc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a **75%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
615141.shortDesc: After **Dissociation** is removed from an enemy, there is a high chance for them to become Frozen.

615142.name: Hesitance
615142.desc: When Freeze is dispelled, enemy targets deal **24%** less DMG, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615142.shortDesc: When an enemy's Frozen state is dispelled, the DMG dealt by the enemy is reduced.

615143.name: Insight
615143.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases by **45%**. After Freezing an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases by **60%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615143.shortDesc: When a character Freezes an enemy, their Effect Hit Rate increases. After inflicting Freeze on an enemy, the DMG dealt by the character increases.

615144.name: Shudder
615144.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, there is a **70%** base chance to apply Ice Weakness to a random enemy who has no Ice Weakness for **2** turn(s).
615144.shortDesc: After a character uses their Ultimate, a random enemy without Ice Weakness gains Ice Weakness.

615145.name: Maverick
615145.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **150%** base chance for all enemies to become Frozen and have their SPD reduced by **30%**, lasting for **1** turn(s).
615145.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, there is a high chance of inflicting Freeze on all enemy units, as well as lowering their SPD.

615146.name: Cynicism
615146.desc: After allies use an attack, there is a **60%** base chance to inflict the **Dissociation** state to the attacked target(s). This effect can trigger a maximum of **1** time(s) per enemy target per battle.
615146.shortDesc: After allies use an attack, there is a chance to inflict **Dissociation** to the attack target.

615150.name: Chronic Ruin
615150.desc: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist Frozen by **45%**.
615150.shortDesc: Reduces enemy targets' chance to resist being Frozen.

615151.name: The Torment of Alienation
615151.desc: Characters' Effect Hit Rate increases by **24%**.

615152.name: Lost Memory
615152.desc: When attacks reduce an enemy's HP percentage to a point that is lower than **50%** for the first time in this battle, there's a **100%** base chance to Freeze the enemy for **1** turn(s).
615152.shortDesc: Enemies have a high chance of becoming Frozen when they fall to low HP from allies' attacks.

615153.name: Stone Cold Hatred
615153.desc: When a character uses their Skill or Ultimate to attack a Frozen enemy, DMG for this attack increases by **54%**.
615153.shortDesc: Characters' Skill and Ultimate deal increased DMG against Frozen enemies.

615154.name: Pain & Suffering
615154.desc: After characters attack a Frozen enemy target, deals Additional DMG equal to **60%** of the attacker's ATK.
615154.shortDesc: After attacking a Frozen enemy target, deal Additional DMG.

615155.name: Primordial Hardship
615155.desc: Increases the DMG taken by Frozen enemies by **24%**.
615155.shortDesc: DMG taken by Frozen enemies increases.

615156.name: Thrill of Escalation
615156.desc: When a character Freezes an enemy, regenerates **12** Energy. This effect may only trigger once per action.
615156.shortDesc: Characters regenerate Energy when they apply Freeze on enemies.

615157.name: Responsive Excitement
615157.desc: When the Freeze on an enemy target is dispelled, the character with the lowest Shield strength gains a Shield that can block DMG equal to **45%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615157.shortDesc: After the Freeze effect on an enemy is removed, the character with the lowest Shield Effect gains a Shield.

615220.name: Self-Annihilator
615220.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Nihility. Inflicts Burn, Shock, Bleed, and 2 stacks of Wind Shear to all enemies for **3** turn(s). After being attacked by a character, the aforementioned DoTs immediately deal DMG equal to **25%** of the original DMG.
615220.shortDesc: After triggering the Boundary Equation, inflict Burn, Shock, Bleed, and Wind Shear on all enemies. After receiving a character's attack, the inflicted DoTs can be triggered.

615230.name: Funeral of Sensory Pursuivant
615230.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply **2** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them. After **Suspicion** reaches **99** stacks for the first time, the provided DoT Vulnerability is no longer affected by the number of stacks and is set at **120%**.
615230.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, apply **2** stack(s) of **Suspicion** on them. After reaching **99** stacks for the first time, DoT Vulnerability increases and is no longer affected by the number of stacks.

615231.name: An Extra Person's Diary
615231.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts either **24** or **4** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
615231.shortDesc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness or attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, inflicts the **Suspicion** effect on it.

615232.name: Why Hasn't Everything Already Disappeared?
615232.desc: At the beginning of an enemy target's turn, additionally trigger extra DoT DMG calculations **1** time(s), and each DoT status currently on the target will immediately deal DMG equal to **135%** of the original DMG.
615232.shortDesc: At the start of an enemy's turn, all DoT statuses on it are triggered **1** extra time(s).

615240.name: Beginning and End
615240.desc: When an enemy inflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, inflicts the same number of stacks of **Suspicion** the defeated enemy has on **2** random enemy target(s).
615240.shortDesc: When an enemy afflicted with **Suspicion** is defeated, transfers the defeated enemy's **Suspicion** stacks to **2** random enemy target(s).

615241.name: Caf√© Self-Deceit
615241.desc: When an enemy is inflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks it gains are doubled.
615241.shortDesc: When an enemy is afflicted with **Suspicion**, the stacks they gains is doubled.

615242.name: Fatal Ailment
615242.desc: After an enemy receives DoT, they deal **7%** reduced DMG, stacking up to **4** time(s) and lasting until the end of the turn.
615242.shortDesc: The more DoTs the enemy takes, the less DMG they deal.

615243.name: Night Beyond Pyre
615243.desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by **45%**.

615244.name: Hell is Other People
615244.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG equal to **210%** of the Weakness Break DMG 1 time to all other enemy targets.
615244.shortDesc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG to other enemies 1 time.

615245.name: All Things are Possible
615245.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to **150%** of the DoT.
615245.shortDesc: If an enemy is under any DoT status when receiving an attack, they will take DMG from a random DoT on them.

615246.name: Path Through the Woods
615246.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, they gain **45** stack(s) of **Suspicion**.
615246.shortDesc: When enemy targets enter battle, they receive **Suspicion**.

615250.name: Ignosticism
615250.desc: DoT effects applied by characters deal **36%** more DMG.

615253.name: Tragic Lecture
615253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by **15%**.
615253.shortDesc: Enemies take increased DMG from DoTs.

615254.name: Self-Manifestation
615254.desc: Reduces DEF of enemies with their Weakness Broken by **20%**.
615254.shortDesc: Enemies with their Weakness Broken have their DEF reduced.

615255.name: Emotional Decluttering
615255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by **4%**. This effect can stack up to **5** time(s).
615255.shortDesc: The more DoTs the enemy has, the more DMG they will receive from all sources.

615256.name: Offerings of Deception
615256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to **2%** of their respective Max HP.
615256.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all characters restore HP.

615257.name: Before Sunrise
615257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates **3** Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of **20** time(s) in one turn.
615257.shortDesc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, a random ally regenerates Energy.

615320.name: Elixir Seekers
615320.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Abundance, restoring HP for all allies by **100%** of the triggering character's Max HP, dispelling all debuffs, and applying **Purgatorial Eradication**, lasting for **3** turn(s).
615320.shortDesc: After triggering the boundary Equation, restores HP for all allies and dispels all debuffs while providing the **Purgatorial Eradication** state.

615330.name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
615330.desc: Charges **Dewdrop** when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to **100%** of the amount of healing received, and increases **Dewdrop**'s DMG multiplier by **40%** of the original multiplier.
615330.shortDesc: When a character's HP is restored, **Dewdrop** is Charged according to the amount of healing received, and DMG done by **Dewdrop** is increased.

615331.name: Mudra of Blessing
615331.desc: Charges **Dewdrop** at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to **70%** of their Max HP.
615331.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, **Dewdrop** is Charged based on the character's Max HP.

615332.name: All Abundance in One Mind
615332.desc: Characters' Max HP increases by **20%**. When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to **35%** of the Outgoing Healing.
615332.shortDesc: Increases Max HP. Healing effects provided by characters can be Blasted to all allies.

615340.name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
615340.desc: Restores HP equal to **20%** of the Charge value when **Dewdrop** ruptures, up to **24%** of the character's Max HP and no less than **12%** of their Max HP.
615340.shortDesc: Restores the character's HP to above a minimum value when **Dewdrop** breaks.

615341.name: The Blessed Many
615341.desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for **Dewdrop** by **120%**.
615341.shortDesc: When a character's HP is full, **Dewdrop**'s Charging Efficiency increases.

615342.name: Candlelight Radiance
615342.desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by **50%** for **1** turn(s).
615342.shortDesc: When a character restores an ally's HP, all allies' ATK increases.

615343.name: Bitter Is the Bane
615343.desc: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to **42%** of the character's Max HP.
615343.shortDesc: After a character uses an attack, they deal Additional DMG based on their Max HP.

615344.name: Corporeal Pellucidity
615344.desc: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by **30%** and increases Effect RES by **30%** until after they are attacked.
615344.shortDesc: When a character's HP is fully restored, their DMG received is reduced and Effect RES is increased until after they are attacked.

615345.name: Prajna Voyage
615345.desc: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to **45%** of the amount of HP healed.
615345.shortDesc: Characters that have their HP restored by an ally also restore extra HP.

615346.name: Offering of Incinerated Flesh
615346.desc: **Dewdrop** DMG caused by characters increase its CRIT Rate by **30%** and CRIT DMG by **75%**.
615346.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG of **Dewdrop** DMG dealt by characters.

615350.name: Dharma Rain
615350.desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by **36%**, lasting for **1** turn(s).
615350.shortDesc: When a character's restored HP exceeds Max HP, their Max HP increases.

615351.name: Dew Delight
615351.shortDesc: Increases the amount of HP restored by characters.

615352.name: Extended Life
615352.desc: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below **50%** for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to **45%** of their Max HP.
615352.shortDesc: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below **50%** for the first time, their HP is restored.

615353.name: Mudra
615353.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to **24%** of their Max HP.
615353.shortDesc: Characters restore HP after inflicting Weakness Break on enemies.

615354.name: Peril Parry
615354.desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by **36%** for **1** turn(s).
615354.shortDesc: After having their HP restored, the character's DEF increases.

615355.name: Back to Life
615355.desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to **18%** of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.shortDesc: After restoring an ally's HP, the healer character also restores HP.

615356.name: Force Victoire
615356.desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by **15%** for **1** turn(s).
615356.shortDesc: After having their HP restored, the character's SPD increases.

615357.name: Anointment
615357.desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a **25%** fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to **2** time(s) per turn.
615357.shortDesc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there is a chance to dispel 1 debuff currently on them.

615420.name: Galaxy Ranger
615420.desc: Spends **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by **100%**, with the Max Energy being **200**.
615420.shortDesc: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by **100%**, with the Max Energy being **200**.

615430.name: Empyrean Imperium
615430.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain **1** stack(s) of **Critical Boost** and sets the stack limit of **Critical Boost** to **12**.
615430.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, they gain **1** stack(s) of **Critical Boost** and raises the stack limit of **Critical Boost**.

615431.name: Radiant Supreme
615431.desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain **7** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.
615431.shortDesc: After defeating an enemy, the character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain **7** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.

615432.name: Sovereign Skybreaker
615432.desc: After a character Breaks enemy targets' Weakness, their action Advances Forward by **100%** and the DMG they deal increases by **75%**. The DMG Boost effect stacks up to **2** time(s) and lasts until the character is attacked.
615432.shortDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by **100%** and their DMG dealt increases. The DMG Boost effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.

615440.name: Skyward Vendetta
615440.desc: If a character has higher than **100%** CRIT Rate and has the **Critical Boost** status, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds **100%**, CRIT DMG increases by **3%**. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to **240%**.
615440.shortDesc: When a character has **Critical Boost**, their excess CRIT Rate turns into CRIT DMG.

615441.name: Adept's Bow
615441.desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a follow-up attack, they can inherit **Critical Boost**, and the number of **Critical Boost** stacks increases by **1**.
615441.shortDesc: Follow-up attacks and Ultimates can inherit and increase **Critical Boost** stacks.

615442.name: Mistwraith Pursuit
615442.desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by **40%**. This effect can stack up to **2** times and gives a **50%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.
615442.shortDesc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases, and there's a chance of recovering a Skill Point.

615443.name: Starward Demonhunt
615443.desc: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by **12%**. This effect stacks up to **3** time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.shortDesc: After a character launches an attack, reduces DMG taken by them. This effect can stack and lasts until the character is attacked.

615444.name: Borisin Chase
615444.desc: After every **6** turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, **5** turn(s) are considered to have already passed.
615444.shortDesc: Every time a certain number of turns had passed, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by **100%**. Upon entering a battle, a certain number of turns is considered to have already passed.

615445.name: Rainbow Fang
615445.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to **45%** of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by **45%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615445.shortDesc: After a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP and increases their ATK.

615446.name: Plague-Purging Warfare
615446.desc: If a character has **4** stack(s) or higher of **Critical Boost** at the start of their turn, their SPD increases by **36%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615446.shortDesc: When a character's turn starts, receive a SPD Boost if they have **4** stacks or higher of **Critical Boost**.

615453.name: Thundering Chariot
615453.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by **30%**.
615453.shortDesc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed.

615454.name: Constellation Surge
615454.desc: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by **45%**, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.shortDesc: After a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, SPD increases. Lasts until the character is attacked.

615455.name: Astral Menace
615455.desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by **12%**.
615455.shortDesc: When a character's turn ends, their action is Advanced Forward.

615456.name: Arboreal Volley
615456.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate **6** Energy.
615456.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, regenerate their Energy.

615457.name: Arrow Shades Bow
615457.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to **15%** of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins after an ally has completed their turn, increase ATK based on the previous ally who had acted.

615520.name: Antimatter Legion
615520.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG the next time the Boundary Resonance is triggered, up to **20** hits.
615520.shortDesc: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG next time.

615530.name: Quasar Meltdown Constant
615530.desc: Every time a character loses or heals **16%** of their HP, obtain **1** stack(s) of the **Grit** effect, with up to **12** stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restored equals to **100%** of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by **45%**.
615530.shortDesc: For every certain percentage of HP that characters lose or heal themselves by, they gain **Grit**. After cumulatively losing or healing by a certain amount of HP, Break Effect is increased.

615531.name: Boundary Density Expansion Group
615531.desc: Every time a character loses or has HP restored, they gain **2** stack(s) of the **Grit** effect and randomly grants **1** of their other teammates **1** stack(s) of the **Grit** effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.shortDesc: Every time a character loses HP or heals themselves, they gain **Grit** and grant random teammates **Grit**.

615532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
615532.desc: Receives **15%** less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.shortDesc: All allies split incoming DMG, and reduces the DMG taken by targeted character.

615540.name: Catastrophic Resonance
615540.desc: When characters with **Grit** use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by **15%**. When **Grit** reaches more than **10** stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by **45%**.
615540.shortDesc: When characters with **Grit** use their abilities, the DMG they deal to enemies increases. When **Grit** reaches more than a certain number of stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies.

615541.name: Indicative Depth of Field
615541.desc: Characters with **Grit** will receive **20%** less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than **50%**, additionally reduces DMG by **12%**.
615541.shortDesc: Characters with **Grit** will take less DMG. When their HP is low, DMG taken is additionally reduced.

615542.name: Tide of Devastation
615542.desc: After a character loses or heals themselves for **40%** accumulated HP, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of **105%** **Super Break DMG**.
615542.shortDesc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for **40%** in total, they will deal **Super Break DMG** after they attack Weakness Broken enemy targets.

615543.name: Decaying Implosion
615543.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for **40%** in total, increase their All-Type RES PEN by **15%**, which additionally increases Super Break DMG dealt by **30%**.
615543.shortDesc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves for **40%** in total, increases their All-Type RES PEN, which is additionally increased when they deal Break DMG.

615544.name: Disciplinary Flicker
615544.desc: If a character's HP percentage is lower than **35%** after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by **12%** of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than **20%**.
615544.shortDesc: When a character is hit or have their HP lowered, their HP is restored if their current HP percentage is lower than **35%**. The lower their HP is, the more HP is restored.

615545.name: Disruptive Pulse
615545.desc: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than **60%**, restores a set amount of Energy equal to **50%** of the character's Max Energy and **1** Skill Point(s). This effect can only trigger again after **4** turn(s).
615545.shortDesc: When a character has their HP percentage lowered to below **60%**, their Energy is regenerated and Skill Points are recovered.

615546.name: Regressive Bull Market
615546.desc: When characters enter battle, gain **18** stack(s) of **Grit**.

615551.name: Reflection
615551.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by **30%** of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect **1** time(s) per battle.
615551.shortDesc: Characters can resist fatal attacks and restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

615553.name: Quasar Jet
615553.desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by **36%**.

615554.name: Metric Reservation
615554.desc: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to **50%** of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **150%** the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for **3** turn(s).
615554.shortDesc: Upon entering battle, characters will consume their HP to **50%** and gain a Shield.

615555.name: Sentinel Satellite
615555.desc: When a character's HP percentage is lower than **50%**, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **30%** of their Max HP for **2** turn(s). This effect can only be triggered **1** time(s) by each character per battle.
615555.shortDesc: When a character's current HP percentage is lower than **50%**, they receive a Shield. This buff can only be triggered a limited number of times.

615556.name: Polarization Receptor
615556.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by **45%** until the start of the next turn.
615556.shortDesc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF.

615557.name: Eternally Collapsing Object
615557.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by **24%** until the start of the next turn.
615557.shortDesc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES.

615620.name: Masked Fools
615620.desc: Can consume **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Elation, dealing follow-up attack DMG of a random Type to all enemies for **5** ‚Äì **10** time(s). And all allies' Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate DMG are all considered as follow-up attack DMG, lasting for **1** turn(s).
615620.shortDesc: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals follow-up attack DMG of a random Type to all enemies for a random number of times and causes all allies' Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate DMG to be considered as follow-up attack DMG.

615630.name: Against the Night**
615630.desc: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal **Aftertaste** DMG 1 time equal to **120%** of their ATK after the next time a follow-up attack is launched. This status can deal DMG up to **5** time(s).
615630.shortDesc: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal **Aftertaste** DMG after the next time a follow-up attack is launched.

615631.name: Rest in Peace**
615631.desc: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **80%** of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for **2** extra time(s).
615631.shortDesc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, deals **Aftertaste** DMG 1 time. If the enemy currently has their Weakness Broken, then deal this DMG **2** extra time(s).

615632.name: Weeping Blackbox**
615632.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by **25%**. This can trigger a max of **3** time(s) per enemy target's turn.
615632.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK on enemies, the enemies' action is delayed.

615640.name: **Portrait of A Man On Fire**
615640.desc: When causing **Aftertaste** DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional **Aftertaste** DMG of different Types for **1** time(s), at DMG values equal to **90%** of the original DMG.
615640.shortDesc: Every time enemies receive **Aftertaste** DMG, they also receive extra **Aftertaste** DMG **1** time(s).

615641.name: **The Hourglass Kindergarten**
615641.desc: For every 1 Type of **Aftertaste** DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by **6%** until the end of their next action.
615641.shortDesc: The more DMG Types an enemy receives from **Aftertaste**, the more their ATK is reduced.

615642.name: **The Painted Albatross**
615642.desc: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to **36%** of their ATK to all enemies hit.
615642.shortDesc: Deals Additional DMG based on the number of enemies hit by Follow-up ATK.

615643.name: ****12** Monkeys and Angry Men**
615643.desc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, increases follow-up attack DMG by **5%**, stacking up to **30** time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
615643.shortDesc: The more instances of Follow-up ATK DMG a character deals to the enemy target, the higher the Follow-up ATK DMG becomes. This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.

615644.name: As Good As Fleming
615644.desc: When a character uses a follow-up attack on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by **12%** for a max of **3** time(s), lasting for **1** turn(s).
615644.shortDesc: The more Follow-up ATKs the characters launch on enemy targets, the more DMG targets receive.

615645.name: A Fish Discovered Fire
615645.desc: Characters' follow-up attack DMG ignores **27%** of the target's DEF.
615645.shortDesc: The Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by characters ignores a certain proportion of the target's DEF.

615646.name: **Last of the Taraka**
615646.desc: **Aftertaste** DMG dealt by characters increases by **105%**.
615646.shortDesc: Increase the DMG dealt by **Aftertaste** triggered by characters.

615650.name: Behold Those Fools
615650.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of follow-up attacks by **66%**.
615650.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT DMG of characters' Follow-up ATK.

615651.name: **Mostly Harmful**
615651.desc: The Weakness Break Efficiency increases by **50%** when characters deal follow-up attack DMG.
615651.shortDesc: Follow-up attacks' Weakness Break Efficiency increases.

615652.name: **Suspiria**
615652.desc: Increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by **39%**.

615653.name: **Pale Fire**
615653.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by **39%**.

615654.name: Back to the Lighthouse
615654.desc: When characters use a follow-up attack, restore **8** Energy. This effect can be triggered up to **1** time(s) per turn.
615654.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they regenerate Energy.

615655.name: **Doctor of Love**
615655.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by **15%** of their Max HP.
615655.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, they restore HP.

615656.name: **Platinum Age**
615656.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by **40%** for **2** turn(s).
615656.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their DEF increases.

615657.name: **Clockwork Apple**
615657.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by **16%** for **2** turn(s).
615657.shortDesc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, their SPD increases.

615720.name: Swarm King Progeny
615720.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use this ability and trigger Boundary Resonance with the Path of Propagation. Enables a target ally to immediately take action and recover **5** Skill Point(s). Gains the **Levitation** effect. When any enemy unit gets defeated by a character that has **Levitation**, Boundary Equation regenerates **50** Energy, with the Max Energy set at **200**.
615720.shortDesc: After triggering the boundary Equation, causes a designated allied target to immediately take action and recovers **5** Skill Point(s) while gaining the **Levitation** effect. When any enemy unit gets defeated by a character that has **Levitation**, Boundary Equation regenerates Energy, with the Max Energy set at **200**.

615730.name: Spore Discharge
615730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain **1** **Spores**. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).
615730.shortDesc: When a character consumes Skill Points, causes all enemies to receive **Spores**. If Skill Points are consumed to 0, increases the character's SPD.

615731.name: Fungal Pustule
615731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 **Spore** to **2** random enemy target(s). The max number of **Spores** increases by **3**.
615731.shortDesc: When a character recovers Skill Points, causes a random enemy to receive **Spores**. Increases the number of **Spores** they can bear.

615732.name: Scythe Limbs
615732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by **45%**. This effect can stack up to **2** time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.
615732.shortDesc: After a character uses an Ultimate, when a Skill Point is consumed or recovered, it is considered as additionally consuming or recovering 1 Skill Point. The more Skill Points a character consumes or recovers, the higher their CRIT DMG.

615740.name: Putrefaction Ulcer
615740.desc: Changes the number of times **Spores** can spread after bursting to **3** times. Can also spread to the original bearer of **Spores**.
615740.shortDesc: The number of times **Spores** can spread after bursting increases. Can also spread to the original bearer.

615741.name: Lytic Enzyme
615741.desc: Increases the DMG caused by **Spores** bursting. The DMG increased is equal to **50%** of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the **Spores** they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.
615741.shortDesc: Increases DMG dealt by **Spores**. After an enemy is defeated, other enemies will receive its **Spores**.

615742.name: Excitatory Gland
615742.desc: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by **50%**. After consuming Skill Points, there is a **20%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
615742.shortDesc: Increases a character's Basic ATK DMG dealt. After consuming Skill Points, there is a chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

615743.name: Exposed Brain Matter
615743.desc: DMG dealt by characters' Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to **35%** of the original DMG to adjacent targets.
615743.shortDesc: Basic ATK DMG will Blast adjacent targets.

615744.name: Intersegmental Membrane
615744.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by **8%** for **1** turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to **3** time(s).
615744.shortDesc: The more Skill Points a character consumes, the lower the DMG they receive.

615745.name: Catalyst
615745.desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by **30%** for **1** turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to **3** time(s).
615745.shortDesc: If, after a character uses their Skill, the Skill does not initiate an attack, increases the DMG of all allies.

615746.name: Blocker Amine
615746.desc: After enemy targets receive DMG from **Spores**, their DEF decreases by **1%**. This effect can stack up to **20** stack(s).
615746.shortDesc: Enemy targets' DEF decreases after receiving **Spore** DMG.

615750.name: Osseus Blade
615750.desc: Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by **36%**.
615750.shortDesc: Characters deal increased Basic ATK DMG.

615751.name: Spinal Spur
615751.desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **36%**.
615751.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT Rate of Characters' Basic ATK.

615752.name: Channeled Needle
615752.desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **60%**.
615752.shortDesc: Increases the CRIT DMG of Characters' Basic ATK

615753.name: Conjunctiva
615753.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by **40%** for **2** turn(s).
615753.shortDesc: When a character uses a Basic ATK, their DEF increases.

615754.name: Scaled Wing
615754.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by **16%** for **2** turn(s).
615754.shortDesc: When a character launches a Basic ATK, their SPD increases.

615755.name: Compound Eye
615755.desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to **5** time(s) across all allies.
615755.shortDesc: After entering battle, allies will recover Skill Points during the first **5** actions.

615756.name: Sporangium
615756.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates **4** extra Energy.
615756.shortDesc: Characters regenerate Energy when consuming Skill Points.

615757.name: Vesicle
615757.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to **15%** of their Max HP.
615757.shortDesc: Characters restore HP when consuming Skill Points

615820.name: Astral Ecology School
615820.desc: Spend **100** points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Erudition. Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemies. Additionally, links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting **Central Link** on all enemies and regenerating Energy equal to **50%** of Max Energy to all allies.
615820.shortDesc: After triggering the boundary Equation, deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies and inflicts the **Central Link** effect on them, regenerating Energy for all allies.

615830.name: BCI**-34** Gray Matter
615830.desc: When entering battle, charges **Brain in a Vat** by **100%**. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge **Brain in a Vat** by **40%** or **5%** respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.
615830.shortDesc: When entering battle, charges the **Brain in a Vat**. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies charges the **Brain in a Vat**.

615831.name: SMR-2 Amygdala
615831.desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the **Brain in a Vat** by **50%**. When the **Brain in a Vat** is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by **20%** for **2** turn(s).
615831.shortDesc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the **Brain in a Vat**. Every time the **Brain in a Vat** is fully charged, gains a SPD bonus.

615832.name: VEP**-18** Occipital Lobe
615832.desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **25%**. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by **3%**.
615832.shortDesc: Increases the All-Type RES PEN for characters' Ultimate DMG. In this battle, the bigger the maximum number of enemy targets an Ultimate hits in a single attack, the greater the increase in the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG.

615840.name: Vestibular System
615840.desc: When characters use Ultimates via **Brain in a Vat**, their CRIT DMG increases by **90%**. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.
615840.shortDesc: Ultimates cast with the **Brain in a Vat** deals more CRIT DMG. This CRIT DMG bonus lasts until the end of the next ATK.

615841.name: Explicit Memory
615841.desc: After characters use their Ultimate via **Brain in a Vat**, they gain a Shield equal in strength to **45%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turns.
615841.shortDesc: Gains Shield when using an Ultimate via the **Brain in a Vat**.

615842.name: Tactile Pathway
615842.desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by **20%** of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.
615842.shortDesc: After characters use an attack, deal additional DMG based on the number of enemies attacked and the number of enemies defeated during the entire battle.

615843.name: Subliminal Sensation
615843.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **50%**. Upon entering battle, regenerates energy equal to **100%** of the character's Max Energy.
615843.shortDesc: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. Regenerates Energy upon entering battle.

615844.name: Striated Cortex
615844.desc: If characters' **AoE ATK** ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to **60%** of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
615844.shortDesc: If characters' **AoE** ability only attacks one enemy, the ability deals a set amount of extra DMG based on the original ability DMG.

615845.name: Saltatory Conduction
615845.desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by **24%**. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to **3** times.
615845.shortDesc: Ultimate attacks delay all Weakness Broken enemies' actions.

615846.name: Resonance Nucleus
615846.desc: After characters use **Brain in a Vat** to use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by **90%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615846.shortDesc: Characters increase their ATK after using **Brain in a Vat** to use their Ultimate.

615850.name: Throne of Engaged Gears
615850.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **27%**.
615850.shortDesc: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters.

615851.name: Ring of Bent Wires
615851.desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **27%**.

615852.name: Scepter of Energy Torque
615852.desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **45%**.

615853.name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
615853.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal **75%** more DMG.
615853.shortDesc: Increases the DMG of the characters' next attack following their Ultimate.

615854.name: Ion-Thruster Sword
615854.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by **36%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
615854.shortDesc: Characters' ATK increases when using Ultimate.

615855.name: Steel Forged Ribbon
615855.desc: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by **8%** for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of **5** time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615855.shortDesc: The more enemies a character attacks, the higher their Max HP increases. The effect lasts until the start of the next turn.

615856.name: Garment of Coiled Wires
615856.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to **24%** of their Max HP.
615856.shortDesc: Characters restore HP after using their Ultimate.

615857.name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
615857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to **100%** of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
615857.shortDesc: Characters can resist fatal DMG and can consume Energy to restore their own HP. This can take effect a limited number of times among all allies.

670010.name: City Restorer
670010.desc: Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order: Each time it takes a turn, absorbs all allies' Shields, reducing their values to 1, and turning the absorbed values into its own Shield. Then, it deals Physical DMG equal to **2500%** of its Shield value plus **1000%** **base DMG** to all enemies, with a **100%** base chance to Freeze enemies for **1** turn(s). When characters take damage, Comet Nucleus's Shield will be consumed first. When **Quake** DMG is triggered, **80%** of Comet Nucleus's Shield will be considered as the character's Shield.
670010.shortDesc: A Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order to block DMG for the team. During its action, it absorbs Shields from allies to deal Physical DMG to all enemies, with a chance to Freeze them.

670060.name: Heartless Giant
670060.desc: "**Quake**" DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, all allies gain 1 "Mechacore Component" stack, up to **77** stack(s). After a character with a Shield is attacked, consumes all of their "Mechacore Component" to deal **7** instances(s) of random-Type "**Quake**" DMG equal to **177%** of the current Shield Effect. Every stack consumed increases this DMG by **7%**.
670060.shortDesc: "**Quake**" DMG is considered as Follow-up ATK DMG. After a character launches Follow-up ATKs, all allies gain the "Mechacore Component" state. After being attacked, consumes "Mechacore Component" to deal "**Quake**" DMG based on the amount consumed and the current Shield Effect.

670140.name: Silent Hunter
670140.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, there is a **100%** base chance for them to be inflicted with **Dissociation** that lasts for **1** turn(s). Enemies in **Dissociation** will resist all DMG, and all CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When the effect is dispelled, additionally deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to **150%** of the tallied value to all enemies. When the tallied value reaches **50%** of the target's Max HP, **Dissociation** will immediately be dispelled.
670140.shortDesc: When enemies enter battle, they have a chance to become afflicted with the **Dissociation** state. Enemies under **Dissociation** will become resistant to all DMG, and CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When this state is dispelled, deal a set amount of CRIT DMG based on the tallied value to all enemies.

670150.name: Mausoleum of Scars
670150.desc: Oblivion appears in the Action Order: For every **10** actual Toughness Reduction dealt by an ally, the ally's action Advances Forward by **3%**. When Oblivion takes action, deals Ice DMG equal to **2000%** **base DMG** and deals **20** Toughness Reduction to all enemies, with a **150%** base chance to inflict the **Dissociation** state on the targets, lasting for **1** turn(s). The state increases DMG taken by **60%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
670150.shortDesc: Oblivion appears in the Action Order: The actual Toughness Reduction dealt by allies will cause the ally's action to be Advanced Forward. When taking action, deals Ice DMG and Toughness Reduction to all enemies with a chance of inflicting **Dissociation** and increasing the DMG taken.

670210.name: Relative Tracer
670210.desc: When an enemy target is afflicted with "**Suspicion**," Freeze, or DoT states, there is a **150%** base chance of Blasting the state to adjacent targets. When there are no adjacent targets, the state is Blasted to the original target. Each state can only be Blasted by the same target once in a single action. When one enemy target has Blasted a total of **20** time(s) or is defeated, deals Ice DMG equal to **1200%** **base DMG** to that target and adjacent targets, with a **60%** base chance to inflict Frozen that lasts for **1** turn(s).
670210.shortDesc: When an enemy target is afflicted with "**Suspicion**," Freeze, or DoT states, there is a high chance of Blasting the state to adjacent targets. After Blasting multiple times, deals DMG to the target and adjacent targets, with a chance to inflict Frozen on them.

670280.name: Self-Proof Institute
670280.desc: After **Suspicion** reaches **99** stacks, it will be consumed and turned into 1 stack of Self-Negation: Increases DoT dealt by attackers to this unit by **70%**. Each stack additionally increases DoT dealt by **10%**, stacking up to **50** time(s). At the start of an enemy's turn, they take Lightning DoT equal to **135%** of **base DMG** and cause adjacent targets to take Lightning DoT equal to **20%** of the original DMG multiplier. At **2** or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates **20%** of **Brain in a Vat** for a random character. At **3** or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates **10%** of **Brain in a Vat** for all allies.
670280.shortDesc: When **Suspicion** reaches a certain number of stacks, it automatically becomes Self-Negation. On the basis of the Self-Negation stacks, increases the DoT dealt by the character, and recovers **Brain in a Vat** for the character and adjacent allied units based on the DMG they dealt at the start of the turn.

670320.name: Herb Plucker
670320.desc: Inflicts "Panacea" on enemy targets when they enter battle: When "**Dewdrop**" breaks, charges the attacked target's "Panacea" by **5%** of the Dewdrop's charge, up to **100%** of the sum of all characters' Max HP. At the start of the enemy target's turn, consumes the Charge value, deals Wind DoT equal to **200%** **base DMG**, and restores all allies' HP by **5%** of Max HP. For every Charge value that equals 1% of the sum of all characters' Max HP, increases this DMG by **8%** and the restored HP amount by **4%**.
670320.shortDesc: When enemy targets enter battle, they receive "Panacea," which Charges when Dewdrop is broken. At the start of the enemy target's turn, deals DoT based on Charge percentage and restores HP to all allies.

670350.name: Borisin
670350.desc: Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. When **Dewdrop** breaks, it will Charge Flower of Annihilation by **600%** of the Dewdrop's charge. When Flower of Annihilation takes action, it deals Charge value + **1200%** of **base DMG** Fire DMG to all enemies. Every stack of **Grit** held by the team will additionally increase the DMG by **2%**.
670350.shortDesc: A Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. During its action, it deals DMG to all enemies. This DMG is affected by the characters' **Dewdrop** charge and **Grit** stacks.

670430.name: Bionic Messiah
670430.desc: When no enemy target has Fiber, Fiber will be applied to random attacked targets after characters use an attack. After targets with Fiber receive a total of **8** attacks or are defeated, the target receives Lightning DMG equal to **4500%** **base DMG**, adjacent targets receive DMG equal to **3000%** **base DMG**, and all allies' Max HP increases by **80%**, lasting for **3** turn(s). If only 1 enemy target is attacked, then **2** attacks are considered to have been launched.
670430.shortDesc: After characters attack, random attacked targets gain Fiber. When targets with Fiber are cumulatively attacked multiple times or defeated, deals Lightning DMG to it and units adjacent to it, and increases all ally units' Max HP.

670470.name: Molten Knight
670470.desc: Every time the team obtains **9** stack(s) of **Critical Boost** or defeats the enemy target, fires **10** Lux Arrow(s) to strike random targets. Each Lux Arrow deals Wind DMG equal to **400%** **base DMG** and applies 1 **Spore** to the attacked target, while also dealing 1 hit of **Spore** burst DMG. During this time, max **Spore** stacks will become **99**.
670470.shortDesc: After the team obtains a certain number of **Critical Boost** stacks or defeats the enemy target, fires Lux Arrows to strike random targets and applies **Spore** to the attacked target while also dealing **Spore** Shatter DMG.

670500.name: Voyage Monitor
670500.desc: After a character deals Break DMG, deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to **100%** of the original damage after the attack. When a character's **Grit** is higher than **30** stack(s), they gain a Shield equal to **50%** of their Max HP, lasting for **2** turn(s). Also, deal DMG equal to **1200%** **base DMG** and **15** Toughness-Reduction to all enemies, and consume **20** stack(s) of **Grit**.
670500.shortDesc: After a character deals Break DMG, deal DMG for 1 extra time. When a character's **Grit** is higher than a certain number of stacks, obtains a Shield. Then, deals DMG to all enemies by consuming **Grit**.

670580.name: Annihilation Scholar
670580.desc: After characters are attacked, receives **2** Annihilation Form(s). After launching a Counter, receives **1** Annihilation Form(s). When a character possesses **6** Annihilation Form(s), removes all Annihilation Forms from them and increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by **150%** for **2** turn(s), as well as dealing Additional DMG equal to **650%** of the character's ATK to all enemies. This DMG is considered as Ultimate DMG.
670580.shortDesc: After characters are attacked or have launched a Counter, they receive Annihilation Form(s). When characters possess **6** Annihilation Form(s), removes all Annihilation Forms and increases the DMG dealt by Ultimate, as well as dealing Ultimate DMG to all enemies.

670630.name: Advisor Physician
670630.desc: DMG dealt by **Dewdrop** is considered as follow-up attack DMG. After **Dewdrop** burst as a result of the character launching a follow-up attack or using an attack, there is a **16%** fixed chance every time for them to trigger the following effect: Charge **Dewdrop** for **80%** of its maximum, and deals DMG equal to 1/2/3/4 time(s) of **Dewdrop**'s Charge with a **10%**/**40%**/**40%**/**10%** fixed chance.
