670630.shortDesc: DMG from **Dewdrop** is considered as follow-up attack DMG. Triggering follow-up attacks or shattering **Dewdrops** has a chance to charge **Dewdrop** and additionally deal multiplied DMG.

670640.name: Phantom Thief
670640.desc: Calling Card appears in the Action Order: After characters launch a follow-up attack, their action advances by **5%**. When taking action, advances the action of the first character in the lineup by **100%**. After this character uses an attack, deals **10** instance(s) of **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **40%** of the character's ATK, taking effect over a max of **4** attacks. Allies' **Aftertaste** DMG multiplier increases by **100%** of the original multiplier, and a countdown with **100** SPD appears in the Action Order. The effects last until the countdown's turn begins.
670640.shortDesc: Calling Card appears in the Action Order: After a character triggers a follow-up attack, Advance their action Forward. When taking action, Advances Forward the action of the first character in the team lineup. After that character uses an attack, deals multiple instances of **Aftertaste** DMG and increases **Aftertaste** DMG dealt by all allies.

670700.name: Star-Molding Worm
670700.desc: Basic ATK and Skill DMG taken by enemy targets increase by **100%**. "Hivespawn" appears on the Action Order: when ally targets gain or consume Skill Points, "Hivespawn" gains 1 Hits Per Action for the next attack. At the start of the turn, "Hivespawn" deals Wind DMG equal to **500%** **base DMG** to one random enemy for each Hit Per Action, and grants a Shield equal to **3%** of respective Max HP for all allies. "Hivespawn"'s Hits Per Action will not be less than **10**.
670700.shortDesc: Basic ATK and Skill DMG taken by enemy targets Increase. A "Hivespawn" countdown appears on the Action Order. Using an attack, consuming Skill Points, or recovering Skill Points at the start of the turn will increase its Hits Per Action. After attacking, provides a Shield to all allies based on Hits Per Action.

670720.name: Child of Calamity
670720.desc: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all **Spores** numbers accumulated by the holder. After accumulating **18** Spores, deals Quantum DMG to all enemies equal to **2200%** of **base DMG**. For every debuff the enemy has, this DMG increases by **10%**, up to an increase of **100%**. Then, the accumulated spore count is cleared.
670720.shortDesc: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all **Spores** accumulated by the holder and deals Quantum DMG to all enemies. The more debuffs active, the higher the DMG.

670860.name: Useless Scholar
670860.desc: After the team uses a total of **6** Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **100%** of the attacker's ATK **3** time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The first character in the team lineup activates their Ultimate, Charges **Brain in a Vat** to **200%**, and uses Ultimate **3** times before the status ends on them.
670860.shortDesc: Enters the Overclock state after all allies have used their Ultimates many times. While in this state, using Ultimates to attack will deal **Aftertaste** DMG, and the first character in the lineup will Charge **Brain in a Vat** by **200%** upon using their Ultimate.

670870.name: Aggregator
670870.desc: After allies use their Ultimates a total of **2** times, deals **2** instances of Wind DMG equal to **400%** of **base DMG** to a random enemy and applies **1** **Spore(s)** to it. This DMG will deal DMG equal to **30%** of the original DMG to adjacent enemies. Every time this effect is triggered, increases the number of instances in this battle by 1 and increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by characters by **7%**, to a maximum of **20** times.
670870.shortDesc: After a total of **2** Ultimates are used across all allies, deals multiple instances of Wind DMG and apply **Spores** to a random enemy target and their adjacent units. Each time this effect is triggered, the number of instances for this DMG increases by 1 in this battle and increases the Ultimate DMG dealt by the characters.

671020.name: The Pathless
671020.desc: When the character deals **Quake** DMG, every type of DoT effect active on the enemy target will increase the current **Quake** DMG multiplier by **50%** of the original multiplier.
671020.shortDesc: The more types of DoTs the enemy has, the higher the **Quake** DMG dealt to them by characters.

671030.name: Ecological Administrator
671030.desc: When characters deal **Quake** DMG, every character at Max HP will increase the current **Quake** DMG multiplier by **35%** of the original multiplier.
671030.shortDesc: The more characters who have full HP, the higher the **Quake** DMG the characters deal.

671060.name: Sentimental Guardian
671060.desc: The Follow-up ATK DMG taken by enemy target increases by **60%**. After the character defeats the enemy target, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT. This effect is removed after allies are attacked, lasting for **2** turn(s).
671060.shortDesc: The Follow-up ATK DMG taken by enemy target increases. After the character defeats the enemy target, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT. This effect is removed after allies are attacked.

671080.name: Civilization Correspondent
671080.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, they gain a Shield that can offset DMG equal to **30%** of their Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s). After dealing Ultimate DMG with an attack, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **600%** of the character's current Shield Effect to the attacked targets.
671080.shortDesc: When characters use their Ultimate, they gain a Shield. Characters' Ultimate attacks will deal **Quake** DMG to the attacked targets based on the current total Shield Effect on the character.

671120.name: Bookwriter
671120.desc: When enemy targets are Frozen, inflicts **10** stack(s) of "**Suspicion**." After suffering DoT, there is a **20%** base chance the target will enter the Frozen state for **1** turn(s). Every enemy target can only enter the Frozen state through this method 1 time every **2** turn(s).
671120.shortDesc: When enemy targets are Frozen, apply "**Suspicion**" on them. DoT has a chance to inflict Freeze on enemy targets.

671130.name: Memory Doctor
671130.desc: "**Dewdrop**"'s Charging Efficiency increases by **50%**. After a character launches an attack, "**Dewdrop**" will additionally deal "**Dewdrop**" DMG 1 time equal to **250%** of the original "**Dewdrop**" DMG multiplier to all Frozen enemy targets.
671130.shortDesc: "**Dewdrop**"'s Charging Efficiency increases. After a character launches an attack, "**Dewdrop**" will additionally deal DMG 1 time to all Frozen enemy targets.

671170.name: Wandering Meme
671170.desc: Increases characters' Basic ATK DMG dealt by **200%**. When using Basic ATK to launch an attack, enemies in the Weakness Broken state will be considered Frozen.
671170.shortDesc: Characters' Basic ATK DMG dealt increases. When using a Basic ATK to attack, Weakness Broken enemies will be considered as being Frozen.

671180.name: Astral Computer
671180.desc: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate **4** Energy. When enemies' **Dissociation** state is dispelled, allies additionally regenerate **8** Energy.
671180.shortDesc: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate Energy. After enemies leave **Dissociation**, allies additionally regenerate Energy.

671210.name: Sizzling Thunder
671210.desc: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, causes all currently active DoT on the target to immediately deal DMG equal to **180%** of the original DMG. Each active DoT will apply 1 stack of **Suspicion**.
671210.shortDesc: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, immediately triggers DoTs 1 time. Each DoT active on it will apply 1 stack of **Suspicion**.

671230.name: Death Denier
671230.desc: Increases characters' DoT dealt by **160%**. After applying a debuff on enemy targets, increases the character's Max HP by **2%** to a maximum of **20** stack(s), lasting for **2** turn(s).
671230.shortDesc: Increases characters' DoT dealt. After a character inflicts a debuff on an enemy target, the character's Max HP increases.

671240.name: Executor of Vengeance
671240.desc: After a character uses an attack, inflicts **3** stack(s) of "**Suspicion**" on the attacked target. Increases Vulnerability provided by "**Suspicion**" by **20%**. When characters hit enemy targets afflicted with "**Suspicion**," increase CRIT DMG dealt based on **80%** of the Vulnerability provided by "**Suspicion**."
671240.shortDesc: After a character uses an attack, inflicts "**Suspicion**" to the attacked target. Vulnerability provided by "**Suspicion**" increases, and CRIT DMG dealt by characters increases based on its stack.

671260.name: Jester of Anatta
671260.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, there is a **150%** base chance to apply 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for **2** turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by **15%**, decrease DEF by **30%**, and decrease SPD by **20%**.
671260.shortDesc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, there is a high chance to inflict a random debuff to the target.

671340.name: Eternal Stranger
671340.desc: When **Dewdrop** Charges, for every 1% of CRIT Rate the character has, there is a **1%** fixed chance to increase the Charge value. The increased ratio equals to **50%** of the character's CRIT DMG.
671340.shortDesc: When **Dewdrop** is charging, the charge value has a chance to CRIT.

671350.name: Pyromancer
671350.desc: Characters' Max HP increases by **50%**. For every **10** of actual Toughness Reduction dealt, Charges all allies' "**Dewdrop**" by **3%**. When attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, charges all allies' "**Dewdrop**" by **6%**.
671350.shortDesc: Characters' Max HP increases. When dealing actual Toughness Reduction or when attacking Weakness Broken enemy targets, charges all allies' "**Dewdrop**."

671360.name: Graveward Lunatic
671360.desc: The characters' Max HP increases by **40%**. After restoring HP equal to **200%** of Max HP, the DMG multiplier of **Aftertaste** DMG dealt increases by **100%** of the original DMG multiplier.
671360.shortDesc: The characters' Max HP increases. After restoring a certain amount of HP, **Aftertaste** DMG increases.

671370.name: Viscorpus
671370.desc: Increases the maximum limit of **Dewdrop** by **100%**. When a character breaks **Dewdrop** by using their Basic ATK, restores **35%** of this **Dewdrop**'s Charge.
671370.shortDesc: Increases maximum limit of **Dewdrop**. When a character breaks **Dewdrop** with their Basic ATK, restores part of **Dewdrop**'s Charge.

671400.name: Disaster-Halting Mechanism
671400.desc: After enemy targets use an attack to reduce characters' Shields, increases all allies' SPD by **35%**, lasting for **2** turn(s), then gains **2** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.
671400.shortDesc: After enemy targets use an attack to reduce characters' Shields, increases all allies' SPD, then gains **Critical Boost**.

671410.name: Fiction's Arbiter
671410.desc: Increases DMG dealt in the next turn by **2%** for each **1%** actual action advance effect the character receives, up to a max of **100%** action advance. This effect is additionally increased against Frozen enemy targets by **50%**.
671410.shortDesc: When an ally target is subjected to the actual advance action effect, their DMG dealt in the next turn increases. The effect additionally increases against Frozen enemy targets.

671450.name: Court of Homogeneity
671450.desc: When an enemy target attacks and if there are character(s) that have **Critical Boost**, increases the DMG taken by the enemy target by **40%**, lasting for **2** turn(s). Meanwhile, Action Advance characters with **Critical Boost**. Each stack of **Critical Boost** Action Advances the character by **5%**.
671450.shortDesc: When an enemy target attacks, if a character has **Critical Boost**, the enemy target takes increased DMG. Additionally, the action of the character with **Critical Boost** is Advanced Forward.

671460.name: Bounty Hunter
671460.desc: When a character's attack deals CRIT DMG, there is a **65%** fixed chance to additionally deal a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to 1‚Äì**100%** of the original DMG for **1** time(s). This is considered as follow-up attack DMG.
671460.shortDesc: When a character deals CRIT DMG, there is a chance to additionally deal CRIT DMG equal to a certain proportion of the original DMG. This is considered as follow-up attack DMG.

671500.name: Pre-Battle Caregiver
671500.desc: Characters' Break Effect increases by **100%**. When inflicting Weakness Break on an enemy with an attack, the attacking character gains a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to **100%** of their Max HP, lasting for **1** turn(s), and then deals **Quake** DMG equal to **1000%** of the current Shield Effect to the target after an attack.
671500.shortDesc: Characters' Break Effect increases. After Breaking an enemy target's Weakness, the attacking character gains a Shield and deals **Quake** DMG based on the current Shield Effect on the target.

671510.name: Memosnatcher
671510.desc: When a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG, consumes their HP equal to **5%** of their current HP. After this attack, there is a **50%** base chance to inflict Freeze on the attack target, lasting for **1** turn(s). Every stack of **Grit** increases the character's Effect Hit Rate by **2%**.
671510.shortDesc: Characters' Ultimates consume HP and have a chance to inflict Freeze on the target. The more the **Grit** stacks they have, the higher the characters' Effect Hit Rate.

671520.name: Wastelander
671520.desc: After a character attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of **100%** **Super Break DMG**. After accumulating **30** stack(s) of **Grit**, additionally deals **100%** **Super Break DMG** caused by this effect.
671520.shortDesc: When characters attack a Weakness Broken enemy target, deals **Super Break DMG**. After accumulating a number of **Grit** stacks, this **Super Break DMG** increases.

671570.name: Self-Betrayer
671570.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, recovers **2** Skill Point(s). Based on the total number of Grit stacks on all allies, for every **5** stack(s) of "**Grit**," increases all allies' Break DMG dealt by **2%**.
671570.shortDesc: When a character Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, recovers Skill Points. The higher the team "**Grit**" stacks, the higher the Break DMG dealt by characters.

671610.name: Reminiscence Artist
671610.desc: **Aftertaste** has a **4%** base chance of causing enemy targets that are not Frozen to become Frozen, lasting for **1** turn(s). Each attack can cause this effect to be calculated for a max of **5** time(s). Increases the DMG multiplier of **Aftertaste** against Frozen enemies by **150%** of the original multiplier.
671610.shortDesc: **Aftertaste** DMG has a chance of Freezing enemy targets. **Aftertaste** DMG multiplier increases against Frozen enemies.

671650.name: Fireworks Master
671650.desc: Follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters increases by **50%**. After a character launches a follow-up attack, deals to the attacked enemy target 1 instance of **Aftertaste** DMG equal to **500%** of the total HP the character lost plus the HP they restored. Then, clears the accumulated HP changes. HP change is accumulated up to **200%** of the character's Max HP.
671650.shortDesc: Follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters increase. After characters launch follow-up attacks, deals **Aftertaste** DMG based on the tallied HP they have lost and HP restored to self.

671670.name: Aether Phantom
671670.desc: Increases max **Spores** to **5**. After characters launch a follow-up attack, apply **3** **Spore(s)** to the target.
671670.shortDesc: Increases max **Spores** limit. When a character launches a follow-up attack, apply **Spores** to the attacked target.

671680.name: Maniacal Chess Player
671680.desc: Increase CRIT DMG dealt by characters' Follow-up ATKs by **100%**. When using "**Brain in a Vat**" to launch Ultimate and deal DMG to enemy targets, it is considered as a Follow-up ATK.
671680.shortDesc: CRIT DMG dealt by characters' Follow-up ATKs increases. Ultimates used via "**Brain in a Vat**" is considered to be Follow-up ATKs.

671700.name: Calamity Worker
671700.desc: When a character gains a Shield, causes **2** random enemy target(s) to gain 1 **Spore**. **Spore's** DMG multiplier increases by **75%** of the original multiplier.
671700.shortDesc: When a character gains a Shield, cause random enemy targets to gain **Spore**. **Spore**'s DMG increases.

671730.name: Calamity Remnant
671730.desc: Each time 1 Skill Point is consumed or overflowed, all allies gain 1 stack of "Honeydew," up to **10** stack(s). After a character uses an attack, they consume all their "Honeydew" stacks. For each stack consumed, deals Additional DMG equal to **80%** Max HP. This attack is considered as Basic ATK DMG.
671730.shortDesc: Each time 1 Skill Point is consumed or overflowed, all allies additionally deal Basic ATK DMG in their next attack based on their Max HP.

671740.name: Diabolical Worker
671740.desc: After a character uses an attack, apply **Spores** to random enemy targets that were attacked. When allies take consecutive action for **1** / **2** / **3** times or more, the added number of **Spores** becomes **4** / **5** / **6**.
671740.shortDesc: After a character uses an attack, apply **Spores** to random enemy targets that were attacked. The more consecutive actions allies take, the more **Spores** will be applied.

671780.name: Deceiver Worker
671780.desc: Increases max **Spores** by **3**. After a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG and if the attacked target's **Spore** bursts, then additionally deals Ultimate DMG equal to **250%** of the character's ATK to the target. Every **Spore** burst by this attack increases this DMG multiplier by **30%**.
671780.shortDesc: Increases max **Spores** limit. After Characters' Ultimate causes **Spores** to burst, deals 1 instance of Ultimate DMG to the attacked target. Every **Spore** burst will increase the DMG.

671800.name: Astral Ecology Care Worker
671800.desc: Increases Ultimate DMG taken by enemy targets by **75%**. Charges "**Brain in a Vat**" by **12%** when Shielded characters are attacked.
671800.shortDesc: Increases Ultimate DMG taken by enemy targets. Charges "**Brain in a Vat**" when Shielded characters are attacked.

671820.name: Block Builder
671820.desc: After characters use an attack, every debuff active on the attacked targets increases the character's ATK by **3%** to a max of **99** stack(s). When the turn ends, lose **10** stacks of this ATK boost.
671820.shortDesc: After characters use an attack, they receive 1 stack of ATK boost for every debuff on the attacked targets. When the turn ends, lose **10** stack(s) of ATK boost.

671840.name: Silverheart Guards
671840.desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, charges **Brain in a Vat** by **25%** and also regenerates Energy equal to **10%** of Max Energy. After defeating the target, regenerates Energy equal to **60%** of Max Energy.
671840.shortDesc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, charges **Brain in a Vat** and also regenerates Energy. After defeating the target, regenerates Energy.

671850.name: Anti-Organic Liquidator
671850.desc: When a character uses an Ultimate, consumes HP from all allies equal to **5%** of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by **30%** to a max of **4** stack(s), lasting for **2** turn(s).
671850.shortDesc: When a character uses their Ultimate, all allies consume HP and increase DMG dealt.

672010.name: Architect Scribe
672010.desc: If a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, then all allies gain a Shield equal to **25%** of their respective Max HP, lasting for **3** turn(s). Every enemy target Frozen during this attack will increase the obtained Shield Effect by **5%** of their respective Max HP.
672010.shortDesc: When a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, all allies will gain a Shield. Every target Frozen during this attack will increase the Shield Effect gained.

672020.name: Tomb Keeper
672020.desc: Characters' Effect RES increases by **25%** and "**Quake**" DMG dealt increases by **50%**. When resisting debuffs inflicted on them, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **400%** of the current Shield Effect to the target. This DMG cannot defeat the enemy target.
672020.shortDesc: Characters' Effect RES increases and "**Quake**" DMG dealt increases. When resisting debuffs inflicted on them, deals "**Quake**" DMG to the target.

672030.name: Planetary Purifier
672030.desc: Increases the Shield Effect gained by characters by **30%**. After losing the Shield, restores HP equal to **25%** of their Max HP.
672030.shortDesc: Increases shields received by characters. After they lose the Shield, they restore HP.

672050.name: Unsinkable
672050.desc: The Shield Effect a character receives increases by **20%**, for every 1% of HP that is different between the character's Max HP and current HP, the Shield Effect additionally increases by **1%**.
672050.shortDesc: The Shield Effect received by the characters increases, the higher the difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, the higher the Shield Effect.

672060.name: Dreamweaver
672060.desc: When a character launches Follow-up ATK, deals **Quake** DMG equal to **360%** of the character's current Shield Effect to the attacked target(s).
672060.shortDesc: After a character launches Follow-up ATK, deals **Quake** DMG based on the current Shield Effect.

672100.name: Scholar of Candles
672100.desc: Increases Character's CRIT DMG by **50%**. When a character takes fatal DMG, their HP will become 1, and they will obtain a Shield equal to **100%** of their Max HP before entering a Freeze state that cannot be dispelled, lasting for **1** turn(s). While in this state, their HP cannot be restored, and the team can trigger this effect **3** time(s) at most. Before the triggers are completely consumed, increase characters' CRIT DMG by **50%**.
672100.shortDesc: Increases characters' CRIT DMG. When characters take fatal DMG, they will not be knocked down. Instead, they will gain a Shield and become Frozen. This can only take effect a certain number of times for the whole team.

672140.name: Cognition Reviewer
672140.desc: After characters attack a non-Elite enemy target with less than **50%** current HP percentage, there is a **150%** base chance to inflict the **Dissociation** state on them, lasting for **1** turn(s), and deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to their current HP.
672140.shortDesc: After characters attack enemy targets with less than **50%** of current HP percentage, there is a chance of inflicting **Dissociation** on them and deals fatal damage to the target.

672150.name: Purifier
672150.desc: When enemy target's current HP is greater than **60%** of Max HP, their duration of being Frozen increases by 1 turn. DMG received by Frozen enemy targets increases by **30%**.
672150.shortDesc: When enemy target's HP percentage is greater than **60%**, their duration of being Frozen increases by 1 turn. DMG received by Frozen enemy targets increases.

672160.name: Biographer
672160.desc: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals **Aftertaste** DMG 1 time equal to **240%** of the character's ATK to the target.
672160.shortDesc: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals **Aftertaste** DMG.

672180.name: Armed Archaeologist Team
672180.desc: After an enemy target becomes Frozen, increase the Ultimate DMG they receive by **60%**. This effect will last for **2** turn(s) after Freeze is dispelled.
672180.shortDesc: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, increases the Ultimate DMG they receive. This effect will endure for a number of turns even after they are no longer Frozen.

672200.name: Night Watch
672200.desc: When the enemy target enters battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to **10%** of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed **650%** of all allies' total Shield Effect.
672200.shortDesc: When enemy targets enter the battle, they are afflicted with Bleed. DMG dealt by Bleed is based on the total sum of Shield on all allies.

672230.name: Doctors of Chaos
672230.desc: Increases DoT dealt by characters by **50%**. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with the "Observed" state and receive Fire DoT equal to **300%** of the total Max HP of all allies at the start of the turn.
672230.shortDesc: DoT dealt by characters increases. When enemy targets enter battle, they become afflicted with the "Observed" state and receive Fire DoT based on the total Max HP of all allies at the start of the turn.

672240.name: Sin Thirster
672240.desc: Characters' DoT can cause CRIT Hit. When dealing DoT, CRIT DMG cannot exceed **100%**.
672240.shortDesc: Characters' DoT can CRIT Hit. CRIT DMG is capped.

672250.name: Rescuer
672250.desc: When enemy targets take Toughness-Reducing DMG during an attack, they have a **100%** base chance of being afflicted with Burn and receiving Fire DMG equal to **120%** **base DMG** at the start of their turn for **2** turn(s).
672250.shortDesc: Enemy targets have a chance of becoming Burned after receiving Toughness-Reducing DMG from an attack.

672280.name: Common Mortal
672280.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, every stack of **Suspicion** they had will regenerate **0** Energy for all allies.
672280.shortDesc: When an enemy target is defeated, all allies regenerate Energy based on the **Suspicion** stacks on it.

672340.name: Wingweaver
672340.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of **Dewdrop** by **20%** up to a maximum of **4** stack(s). Also restores HP for all allies equal to **50%** of their respective Max HP.
672340.shortDesc: When an enemy target is defeated, increases the Charging Efficiency of **Dewdrop**. Also, restores HP for all allies.

672350.name: Houyhnhnm
672350.desc: Every stack of **Grit** a character has will increase their Incoming Healing by **2%**.
672350.shortDesc: The higher the **Grit** stacks are, the higher the character's HP recovery is increased.

672360.name: Peculiar Physician
672360.desc: Increases maximum limit of "**Dewdrop**" by **50%**. After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, restores HP equal to **10%** of Max HP to the character with the lowest current HP percentage.
672360.shortDesc: Maximum limit of "**Dewdrop**" increases. After characters launch Follow-up ATKs, restores HP to the character with the lowest HP percentage.

672370.name: Symbiote
672370.desc: Increases character's HP restoration by **35%**. After providing healing to allies, there is a **50%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can trigger 1 time per character action.
672370.shortDesc: Increases characters' HP recovery. Has a chance of recovering Skill Points after providing healing to an allied target.

672371.name: Tree of Discard
672371.desc: Increases characters' Outgoing Healing by **30%**. After providing healing to an allied target, inflicts **2** **Spore(s)** to a random enemy target.
672371.shortDesc: Increases characters' Outgoing Healing. After providing healing to an allied target, inflict **Spores** to a random enemy target.

672400.name: Borderstar Gunslinger
672400.desc: After a character is attacked and if they did not take DMG from this attack, they will only lose **1** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.
672400.shortDesc: When a character is attacked and does not take DMG, they will only lose a small amount of **Critical Boost**.

672410.name: Amnesiac
672410.desc: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of **Critical Boost** additionally increases CRIT Rate by **4%** and CRIT DMG by **30%**.
672410.shortDesc: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of **Critical Boost** additionally increases CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

672430.name: Pacifist
672430.desc: When a character's turn begins, every stack of **Critical Boost** they have will restore their HP equal to **5%** of their Max HP, and restore HP to teammates equal to **2%** of their respective Max HP.
672430.shortDesc: When a character's turn begins, restore all allies' HP based on the number of **Critical Boost** stacks they have.

672470.name: Departing Wanderer
672470.desc: Increases characters' Basic ATK and Skill CRIT DMG dealt by **100%**. The excess "**Critical Boost**" stacks will be regained at the start of the character's turn.
672470.shortDesc: Characters' Basic ATK and Skill CRIT DMG increase. The excess "**Critical Boost**" stacks will be regained at the start of the character's turn.

672480.name: Rehearser
672480.desc: Increases CRIT DMG by **8%** for each stack of **Critical Boost**. When a character uses their Ultimate, inherits this max stack number and receives **2** stack(s) of **Critical Boost**.
672480.shortDesc: Each stack of **Critical Boost** provides additional CRIT DMG. After a character uses their Ultimate, inherits and increases **Critical Boost** stacks.

672510.name: Gravedigger
672510.desc: After characters Break enemy targets, there is a **120%** base chance to afflict it with Freeze, lasting for **1** turn(s). If this enemy target is already Frozen, then additionally deal 1 instance of Break DMG equal to **200%** of the Break DMG that would have been dealt this time.
672510.shortDesc: After characters Break enemy targets, there is a **120%** base chance to afflict it with Freeze, lasting for **1** turn(s). If this enemy target is already Frozen, then additionally deal 1 instance of Break DMG equal to **200%** of the Break DMG that would have been dealt this time.

672520.name: Walker of the Scorched
672520.desc: When a character has **Grit**, increases their All-Type RES PEN by **15%**. Each stack of **Grit** a character has will increase their Break Effect by **3%**.
672520.shortDesc: When a character has **Grit**, increases their All-Type RES PEN. Each stack of **Grit** a character has will increase their Break Effect.

672530.name: Pyromaniac
672530.desc: Each stack of **Grit** increases the character's Max HP by **6%**, but Maximum Restorable HP will be reduced to **80%** of the additional Max HP.
672530.shortDesc: Each stack of **Grit** increases the characters' Max HP, but reduces Maximum Restorable HP.

672540.name: Sand Retrograder
672540.desc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency by **20%**. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD by **25%**, lasting for **3** turn(s).
672540.shortDesc: Increases characters' Weakness Break Efficiency. After Weakness Breaking an enemy target, increases SPD.

672580.name: Firesmith
672580.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **60%**. Every 1% of HP a character loses will Charge **Brain in a Vat** by **1%**.
672580.shortDesc: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. Charges **Brain in a Vat** when characters lose HP.

672600.name: Battlefield Magician
672600.desc: After characters attack, receives a Shield equal to **3%** of the character's Max HP for every instance of **Aftertaste** DMG dealt in this attack. The Shield cannot exceed **36%** of the character's Max HP and lasts for **1** turn(s).
672600.shortDesc: After characters use attacks, the more hits dealt from **Aftertaste**, the higher the Shield Effect gained.

672620.name: Candy Knight
672620.desc: The **Aftertaste** DMG dealt by characters can ignore Weakness Type and reduce **3** Toughness from enemy targets. In a single attack, this effect can be triggered against each enemy target up to **7** time(s).
672620.shortDesc: Characters' **Aftertaste** DMG can reduce enemy target's Toughness regardless of the corresponding Type.

672630.name: Drifting Circus
672630.desc: Every time characters deal **Aftertaste** DMG, their Max HP increases by **5%**, up to a max of **15** stack(s) and lasting for **1** turn(s).
672630.shortDesc: The more hits of **Aftertaste** DMG triggered by characters, the higher their Max HP become.

672670.name: Balloon Merchant
672670.desc: Increases the follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by **50%**. After launching a follow-up attack, there is a **100%** fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
672670.shortDesc: Increases the follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters. After launching a follow-up attack, recovers Skill Points.

672680.name: Creation Vocalist
672680.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, then after their next attack, deals **2** instance(s) of "**Aftertaste**" DMG to the attacked target, with each instance equal to **150%** of the character's ATK.
672680.shortDesc: After characters use their Ultimates, deal "**Aftertaste**" DMG after their next attack.

672700.name: Phantom Larva
672700.desc: Increases Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by characters by **60%**. When "**Spores**" burst, the DMG dealt increases by **100%** of the total Collective Shield effect.
672700.shortDesc: Basic ATK and Skill DMG dealt by characters increase. When "**Spore**" burst, the DMG dealt increases based on the total Collective Shield effect.

672710.name: Phantom Worker
672710.desc: The **Spore** DMG received by enemy targets increases by **35%**. Reduces enemies' Effect RES by **10%** for each **Spore** stack they have.
672710.shortDesc: The **Spore** DMG received by the enemy target increases. The more **Spore** stacks enemy targets have, the lower their Effect RES becomes.

672720.name: Afterglow Worker
672720.desc: Increases **Spore's** DMG multiplier by **60%** of the original multiplier. When Spores burst, the DMG multiplier increases additionally by **3%** of the original multiplier for each debuff the enemy target has.
672720.shortDesc: Increases **Spore**'s DMG. When Spores burst, the DMG increases additionally for each debuff the enemy target has.

672721.name: Pacifist Worker
672721.desc: Every time characters consume Skill Points or have Skill Points overflow, there is a **150%** base chance to inflict a random debuff on random enemy targets, lasting for **2** turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by **15%**, decrease Effect RES by **20%**, or decrease Effect Hit Rate by **30%**.
672721.shortDesc: Every time characters consume Skill Points or have Skill Points overflow, there is a chance to inflict a random debuff on random enemy targets. The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt, decrease Effect RES, or decrease Effect Hit Rate.

672750.name: Starcrusher Worker
672750.desc: The characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by **80%**. When a character uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to **50%**, consumes HP equal to **5%** of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.
672750.shortDesc: The Basic ATK DMG dealt by the characters increases. When a character uses Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to **50%**, they consume HP and additionally recover Skill Points.

672810.name: Candelagraph Inspector
672810.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, for each **10** Energy consumed, increases ATK by **4%** and Effect Hit Rate by **2%**. This effect can stack up to **20** times, lasting for **2** turn(s). Each time an Ultimate is used, it will be considered as having consumed at least **80** Energy.
672810.shortDesc: When characters use Ultimate, their ATK and Effect Hit Rate increase based on the amount of Energy consumed.

672840.name: Penman
672840.desc: After a character attacks and deals Ultimate DMG, for every enemy target hit, deals Ultimate DMG equal to **100%** of the character's ATK to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.
672840.shortDesc: For every enemy target that the character's Ultimate hits, deals Ultimate DMG to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.

672850.name: Star-Picker
672850.desc: When characters use Ultimate, gains **3** stack(s) of **Grit** and increases SPD by **25%** and ATK by **20%**, lasting for **2** turn(s).
672850.shortDesc: Gains **Grit** when characters use their Ultimate, then boosts their SPD and ATK.

672860.name: Repairman
672860.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by **60%**. After triggering a follow-up attack, every enemy target hit by the attack will make the next Ultimate ignore **5%** of the enemy targets' DEF, stacking up to **5** time(s).
672860.shortDesc: Increases Ultimate DMG dealt by characters. After using a follow-up attack, every enemy target hit will additionally let the next Ultimate ignore target's DEF.

672870.name: Kolchis
672870.desc: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by characters, increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by **65%**, up to a max of **130%** and lasting until after using the Ultimate.
672870.shortDesc: The more Skill Points characters consume, the more Ultimate DMG they deal.
